T02D2538:67b-0: @67b * // 'jam dpal mtshan brjod kyi bshad 'bum bzhugs /

T02D2538:84b-27: srung ba'i phrin las kyi bdag nyid yin pas mchod pa'i bar chad kyi bgegs zhi bar byed /
T02D2538:84b-29: bgegs zhi bar spro bas kyang cher dga' ba 'byung bas de skad bya'o //
T02D2538:84b-33: rdo rje khu tshur ni thams cad 'dus pa'i phrin
T02D2538:84b-34: las kyi bdag nyid de mchod pa de rnams stong
T02D2538:84b-35: par ro gcig par byed la /
T02D2538:84b-37: chen po ni gcig tu bsdus pa /
T02D2538:84b-38: mig 'phrul ni yod pa 'jig pa med pa sprul pas de skad bya'o //
T02D2538:84b-39: sbyin bdag ces pa nas mar tshig rkang bzhis sgeg
T02D2538:84b-40: mo la sogs pa gsang ba'i lha mo bzhi'i mtshan
T02D2538:84b-41: bstan te / mtshan can de'i mtshan nyid thun mong dang /
T02D2538:84b-42: bye brag gi mtshan nyid bcu'am bcu gcig brtsi /
T02D2538:84b-44: kun rdzob tu rtags kyi sgo nas skra dang /
T02D2538:84b-46: mtshan mas khyad par du byas pa'i sgo la sogs
T02D2538:84b-47: pa nang gi bzhi la shar lho nas rim pa
T02D2538:85a-1: 'di ni stobs kyi mtshan nyid de /
T02D2538:85a-2: de rnams kyang sgeg mo ni byang chub kyi sems kyi mchod pa dang ldan pa'i nyams dang /
T02D2538:85a-3: de bzhin du phreng ba ma rin po ches /
T02D2538:85a-5: gar ma gar gyi sa mchod pa'i nyams dang ldan pa ste rtags so //
T02D2538:85a-6: don gyi mtshan nyid ni 'dir sbyin pa la sogs
T02D2538:85a-7: pa bzhi btang ba las gong du 'bras bu 'di
T02D2538:85a-8: bzhir 'chad de / yon tan dang ldan no //
T02D2538:85a-9: yang na gnyis med gcig po de nyid la mi
T02D2538:85a-10: mthun pa'i phyogs ser sna la sogs pa bzhi med
T02D2538:85a-11: pa'o // ngos nas sbyin pa la sogs pa bzhir
T02D2538:85a-12: de nyid la lha mo l'a sya ma la sogs
T02D2538:85a-13: pa'o // pa bzhi bya / bzhi po sbyin pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid mtshan 'dzin te /
T02D2538:85a-14: de ni don gyi mtshan nyid do //
T02D2538:85a-15: 'di rnams ni g-yog mo longs spyod kyi lha mo yin te /
T02D2538:85a-17: bzang ngan du 'ong ba'i nad ka ni ya kir
T02D2538:85a-18: 'bras bu'i chos la mtshon pa rigs lnga ste shin
T02D2538:85a-19: tu bzang / de thob par byed pa'i lam byang chub sems dpa' ste /
T02D2538:85a-20: longs spyod kyi lha mo rnams lam gyi grogs te /
T02D2538:85a-21: tshul khrims la sogs pa mi brtsi na des na
T02D2538:85a-22: 'dis lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa gcig go ba'i
T02D2538:85a-23: brda'o // 'di rnams la gsang ba'i lha mor 'dogs pa'i 'thad pa ni /
T02D2538:85a-24: me tog la sogs pa phyi'i rdzas yin la /
T02D2538:85a-25: 'di ni zag med sems kyi mchod pa de gzhan gyis mi mthong ba'o //
T02D2538:85a-26: gtso 'khor gyi 'thad pa ni spyi 'khor sum brtsegs pa'i spyi 'khor yin te /
T02D2538:85a-27: 'di rnams gnyis de'i yon tan gyi bye brag yin te /
T02D2538:85a-28: sgos 'khor ni mi bskyod pa'i 'khor sgeg mo des bsgres te /
T02D2538:85a-29: 'di rnams yon tan bye brag pa yin pas spyi la brten /
T02D2538:85a-30: des na rten sa dang brten pas khyad par du byas so //
T02D2538:85a-31: thabs shes rab kyi 'brel pa ni 'di la med de g-yog yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2538:85a-32: phrin las ni 'phags pa mchod sems can pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod pa'o //
T02D2538:85a-33: sgom thabs gzhan du shes so //
T02D2538:85a-34: de yang rang dga' bar bsgom pa ni mchog gi
T02D2538:85a-35: dngos grub tu mi rung gi thun mong man chad
T02D2538:85a-37: slob dpon sangs rgyas gsang ba ni bsgrub pa'i lha
T02D2538:85b-0: rigs lnga sems dpa' bcu @85b drug ste nyi shu
T02D2538:85b-1: rtsa gcig las med par bzhed do //
T02D2538:85b-2: slob dpon kun dga' snying po ni me tog gang la phog pa di sgom du bzhed do //
T02D2538:85b-3: slob dpon sgeg pa'i rdo rje ni longs spyod kyi lha lugs la sgom pa snga ma bzhed do //
T02D2538:85b-4: de ltar lha mo bzhi po de la so so'i mtshan nyid gsang ba'i lha mor 'thad pa dang /
T02D2538:85b-5: g-yog dang gtso 'khor gyi 'thad pa dang /
T02D2538:85b-8: de la lha mo 'di rnams ming 'og tu bcug nas mnan te /
T02D2538:85b-9: yon tan gyi sgo nas bstod de /
T02D2538:85b-10: sgeg mo la khyod kyis sbyin bdag mo chen mo yin no zhes bstod de /
T02D2538:85b-12: dad pas sangs rgyas la sbyin pa dang /
T02D2538:85b-13: thugs rjes sems can la sbyin pa gtong ba'i bdag
T02D2538:85b-14: mo khyod yin pa'i phyir khyod de bskyed par bya
T02D2538:85b-16: chen po ni 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'o //
T02D2538:85b-17: yang sgeg mo la gtso bo zhes bya ste /
T02D2538:85b-19: sbyin pa rnam pa bzhi gtong ba'i phyir de la dbang bas de skad bya'o //
T02D2538:85b-20: yang phreng ba ma tshul khrims chen po zhes bya /
T02D2538:85b-23: tshul khrims gsum las 'dir lus ngag yid sdom pa ste /
T02D2538:85b-24: de la 'khor gsum dag pa chen po 'chang ba ni de 'dzin pas de skad bya'o //
T02D2538:85b-26: khyod ni bzod chen brtan pa po //
T02D2538:85b-29: bzod pa ni gsum las zab mo'i don la bzod cing sran tshugs pa ste /
T02D2538:85b-30: de yang 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa che'o //
T02D2538:85b-31: de'i don 'dzin pa ni 'chang ba brtan pa ni mi 'gyur ba'o //
T02D2538:85b-32: gar ma la brtson 'grus chen po zhes pa dang brtul ba yin zhes bya ste /
T02D2538:85b-34: 'jig rten 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba la spro
T02D2538:85b-35: zhing de rdzogs par byed la 'khor gsum dag pas
T02D2538:85b-36: chen po'o // 'jig rten dang 'das pa'i dkar po'i
T02D2538:85b-37: yon tan thams cad la brtson 'grus kyis rdzogs par
T02D2538:85b-39: de'i phyir khyod la de skad bya'o //
T02D2538:85b-40: bsam gtan zhes pa'i tshig gnyis dang thabs che ba
T02D2538:85b-41: smon lam rnams kyis phyi'i lha mo bzhi'i mtshan bstan
T02D2538:85b-42: te / shes rab dang go bsnur la bshad /
T02D2538:85b-43: 'di rnams la'ang drug 'bru bshad pa dang bdun te /
T02D2538:86a-1: mtshan ma la sogs pa'i khyad par du byas pa'o //
T02D2538:86a-2: bskal bzang gi grva bzhi'i shar lho nas rim pas spos me tog mar me dri chab bzhi /
T02D2538:86a-3: de bzhis mchod pa'i nyams dang ldan pa'i lha mo //
T02D2538:86a-4: shes rab chen po lus 'chang ba //
T02D2538:86a-5: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i mtshan can du byung la /
T02D2538:86a-6: don gyi sgo nas 'dir de bzhis sangs rgyas mchod
T02D2538:86a-7: pas 'bras bu de bzhir shar te yon tan yar
T02D2538:86a-8: ldan no // de bzhi der byung ba de'i mtshan nyid 'dzin no //
T02D2538:86a-9: yang na gnyis med gcig po de la shes rab 'chang ba dang /
T02D2538:86a-12: log pa'i smon lam la sogs pa med de /
T02D2538:86a-13: de bzhi'i gnyen por shes rab bsam gtan thabs yang
T02D2538:86a-14: dag pa'i smon lam rnams su 'byung la de bzhi
T02D2538:86a-16: de bzhi de'i mtshan nyid 'dzin te don gyi mtshan nyid do //
T02D2538:86a-18: phyi'i lha mor bzhag pa dang /
T02D2538:86a-19: las med de longs spyod yin no //
T02D2538:86a-22: de la lha mo dh'uppe ma la khyod ni /
T02D2538:86a-23: shes rab chen po lus 'chang ba //
T02D2538:86a-24: zhes pa'i yon tan dang ldan no zhes bstod de /
T02D2538:86a-26: shes rab kyis chos thams cad rab tu 'byed pa'i lus can ni dh'uppe ma yin la /
T02D2538:86a-27: shes rab de 'chang ba'i shes rab kyi gnyen po yin pas chen po yang yin no //
T02D2538:86a-28: de'i lus 'dzin pas na dh'uppe ma de la de skad bya'o //
T02D2538:86a-30: bsam gtan chen po ting 'dzin gnas //
T02D2538:86a-33: me tog ma khyod ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
T02D2538:86a-34: bsam gtan gyi ngo bo rnam g-yeng gi gnyen por
T02D2538:86a-35: 'dug ste / chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gong ma
T02D2538:86a-36: de mi gtong ba'i phyir du pushpe ma la de
T02D2538:86a-37: 'dug ste / skad bya'o // mar me ma la thabs che zhes bya ste /
T02D2538:86a-39: thabs ma lus pas sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa rdzogs par byed de /
T02D2538:86a-40: thabs chung ba'i mi mthun pa med cing de'i gnyen po bas de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2538:86a-41: dri chab ma la bsam pa'i zhes bya ste /
T02D2538:86a-43: bsam pa ni smon lam la bya la /
T02D2538:86a-44: yang dag pa'i smon lam gyis phyin ci log gi
T02D2538:86b-0: smon pa'i @86b gnyen por gyur pa'i cha nas de
T02D2538:86b-1: skad bya'o // stobs po che la zhes bya ba /
T02D2538:86b-2: ye shes rgya mtsho zhes pa sgo ba bzhi'i mtshan ston te /
T02D2538:86b-3: 'di rnams mtshan nyid ni lcags kyu la sogs pa sgo ba bzhi thun mong dang /
T02D2538:86b-4: bye brag gi sgo nas kun rdzob ste rtags kyi mtshan nyid do //
T02D2538:86b-9: ting nge 'dzin dang bzhi rnams bsgoms pas gong du tshogs lam /
T02D2538:86b-12: bsgom lam bzhi'i yon tan yar ldan du 'byung /
T02D2538:86b-15: yang na sbyor lam gyi drod rtse mo gnyis la dad pa dang /
T02D2538:86b-19: de rnams bsgoms pas sems ma dad pa /
T02D2538:86b-22: rnam g-yeng ba'i phyogs su 'dug la /
T02D2538:86b-26: ting nge 'dzin gyi gnyen po bzhi kha drag par
T02D2538:86b-27: 'dug pas de rnams kyi dus na ni dbang po
T02D2538:86b-29: bzod pa dang chos mchog gi dus na ma dad pa la sogs pa'i mi mthun pa med de /
T02D2538:86b-30: gnyen po dad pa la sogs pa bzhi po sha
T02D2538:86b-31: stag tu 'dug pas dad pa la sogs pa stobs
T02D2538:86b-32: bzhi'o // de bzhi la sgo bzhi bya ste /
T02D2538:86b-33: mtshan gnyis las med kyang don bzhi chang tshang ste /
T02D2538:86b-35: dad pa tshogs lam gyi ye shes sgo ba lcags kyu /
T02D2538:86b-36: de bzhin du brtson 'grus sbyor lam gyi ye shes sgo ba zhags pa /
T02D2538:86b-37: dran pa mthong lam gyi ye shes sgo ba lcags sgrog ting nge 'dzin stobs /
T02D2538:86b-39: sgo ba ni dril bu zhes bya'o //
T02D2538:86b-40: rdo rje ni don gyi mtshan nyid do //
T02D2538:86b-41: gtso 'khor gyi 'thad pa nas sgom thabs kyi bar du snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2538:86b-42: byams chen rang bzhin zhes pa nas mar tshig rkang
T02D2538:86b-43: drug gis thabs kyi bskal bzang gi sems dpa'i mtshan
T02D2538:86b-44: te / 'di rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni rtags kyi
T02D2538:86b-45: mtshan nyid kun rdzob kyi sgo nas ni thun mong
T02D2538:86b-47: de la mtshan ni phyag mtshan rang rang bdag pos dbu brgyan /
T02D2538:86b-48: sku mdog ni khyad par ro //
T02D2538:86b-49: bzhugs tshul gdan rgyan phrin las rnams thun mong ste /
T02D2538:87a-3: don gyi mtshan nyid ni gnyis med kyi ye shes
T02D2538:87a-4: gcig la ldog pa'i bye brag gis ye shes lnga
T02D2538:87a-5: / de la ldog pa'i bye brag gis stong pa
T02D2538:87a-6: bcu drug / de la shes rab kyi sems dpa'
T02D2538:87a-8: bskal bzang 'di rnams ni stong pa bcu drug la dmigs pa'i rig pa ste /
T02D2538:87a-9: nang stong pa nyid rig pa nas dngos po med
T02D2538:87a-10: pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rig pa'i bar
T02D2538:87a-11: du bcu drug la thabs kyi sems dpa' bcu drug
T02D2538:87a-12: gzhag / rig pa de rnams der byung ste /
T02D2538:87a-13: de nyid de'i mtshan nyid 'dzin de ni don dam gyi mtshan nyid do //
T02D2538:87a-16: phrin las kyi khyad par dang /
T02D2538:87a-17: sgom thabs rnams gong ma bzhin no //
T02D2538:87a-18: thabs shes rab kyi 'brel pa ni /
T02D2538:87a-19: shes rab kyi sems dpa' bcu drug la /
T02D2538:87a-20: thad kha thad khar dmigs shing 'brel lo //
T02D2538:87a-21: byams chen zhes pa nas mar sems can bde ba la dgod pa'o //
T02D2538:87a-22: rang bzhin ni de'i dus su skye med du rtogs shing dmigs pa'o //
T02D2538:87a-23: dpag tu med pa ni skye med du dmigs shing
T02D2538:87a-24: 'jig rten thams cad la bu gcig pa ltar byams
T02D2538:87a-25: pa rgyun mi gcod de des na byams pa la
T02D2538:87a-26: de skad bya'o // snying rje chen po zhes pa
T02D2538:87a-27: 'jam dpal ni mi dmigs pa'i thabs thugs rje chen
T02D2538:87a-28: pos sems can gyi don byed pas rgya che ba
T02D2538:87a-29: de skad bya'o // dang / blo'i mchog ces pa
T02D2538:87a-30: skye med kyi blos gnyis med du rtogs pa ste
T02D2538:87a-31: de skad bya'o // dang / / khyod ni zab
T02D2538:87a-32: pa dang rgya che ba'i mtshan nyid can no zhes
T02D2538:87a-33: de skad bya'o // dang / / bstod do //
T02D2538:87a-34: shes rab chen po blo chen ldan zhes pa spos
T02D2538:87a-35: kyi glang po la de skad bya ste /
T02D2538:87a-37: khyod ni chos thams cad rab tu rnam par 'byed
T02D2538:87a-38: pa'i shes rab kyi bdag nyid la de skad bya
T02D2538:87a-39: la / de'i khyod ni blo chen po dang ldan pa zhes kyang bstod do //
T02D2538:87a-40: khyod ni mkhas pa chen po zhes bya ste /
T02D2538:87a-42: dbang po rab 'bring tha ma'i sgo nas sems can
T02D2538:87a-43: 'dul ba'i thabs la mkhas pas de skad bya la
T02D2538:87a-44: / nyon mongs pa bag la nyal dang mthun pa'i
T02D2538:87a-45: chos ston pas thabs che ba zhes kyang bstod do
T02D2538:87a-47: rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs dang ldan //
T02D2538:87b-0: rkang mtheb sen mos tshangs pa'i @87b g-yul sa gnon
T02D2538:87b-1: pa la sogs pa'i stobs sam rdzu 'phrul de mnga'
T02D2538:87b-3: blo gros chen po la mgyogs pa chen po zhes bya ste /
T02D2538:87b-4: sangs rgyas mchod pa dang srid zhu'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams du mar bskyod pa'i phyir /
T02D2538:87b-5: shugs chen zhes bya zhe na /
T02D2538:87b-6: ye shes kyi shugs drag pos 'gro ba'i phyir de skad bya'o //
T02D2538:87b-7: blo gros mi zad pa la rdzu 'phrul chen po zhes bstod de /
T02D2538:87b-11: rang sangs rgyas kyi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2538:87b-12: khyod ni cher grags pa zhes kyang bya ste ;
T02D2538:87b-13: sangs rgyas kyi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2538:87b-14: spobs pa brtsegs pa la khyod ni /
T02D2538:87b-15: stobs chen pha rol gnon pa po //
T02D2538:87b-18: gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa la sogs
T02D2538:87b-19: pa stobs bcu nyan thos la sogs ba zil gyis
T02D2538:87b-22: srid pa'i ri bo chen po 'joms //
T02D2538:87b-25: srid pa nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga 'jig dka' bas brag ri dang 'dra ste /
T02D2538:87b-26: yang dag pa'i ye shes thob nas 'joms pa ste /
T02D2538:87b-27: khyod ni de dang ldan pa'i phyir de skad ces brjod do //
T02D2538:87b-29: mkhregs shing rdo rje chen po 'chang //
T02D2538:87b-32: khyod ni kun du bzang po'i ye shes kyi rdo rje 'dzin pa ste /
T02D2538:87b-33: de yang gzung 'dzin gyis mi phyed pas sra ba'i lus dang ldan pas na mkhregs zhes brjod de /
T02D2538:87b-34: mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad 'joms pa'i blo gros la drag po chen po zhes bya ste /
T02D2538:87b-36: khyod ni gdul dka' ba'i gdul bya la khro bor sprul pa'i phyir de skad bya la /
T02D2538:87b-37: bcos pa'i drag shul gyis 'dul ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2538:87b-42: de yang 'jigs chen ni lha gsum ste /
T02D2538:87b-43: tshangs pas sa bla ma h'a de bas sa steng khyab 'jug gis sa 'og 'jigs te /
T02D2538:87b-44: khyod ni de gsum yang 'jigs par byed pa po yin pa'i phyir de skad brjod do //
T02D2538:88a-1: 'od gzhon nu la mgon po zhes bstod de /
T02D2538:88a-3: gsang sngags kyi theg pa ni theg pa'i mchog ste /
T02D2538:88a-4: sems can skyob pa'i phyir de skad bya la /
T02D2538:88a-5: de la ni rigs mchog chen po zhes kyang bya ste /
T02D2538:88a-6: dha ra zhes pa'i sgra rigs bzung ba dang 'chang ba dang 'dzin pa la 'jug ste /
T02D2538:88a-7: 'dir ni tshig don sngags phyag rgya gzhung bzhis sems can skyong ba'i phyir /
T02D2538:88a-8: mchog dang chen po yang yin pas de skad brjod do //
T02D2538:88a-9: 'od dpag med la bla ma zhes bstod de /
T02D2538:88a-11: khyod ni sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa'am dbang po rab 'bring dang sbyar nas /
T02D2538:88a-12: nyon mongs pa bag la nyal dang ji ltar 'tsham pa bzhin du shes nas /
T02D2538:88a-13: de dang de'i lam nye bar ston pa'i phyir de skad bya la /
T02D2538:88a-14: de yang skye med kyi rtog pa dang mi 'bral bas gsang sngags che ba'i mchog ces bya'o //
T02D2538:88a-16: theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas //
T02D2538:88a-19: khyod ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa'i lam la gnas la tshul ni bgrod pa dang /
T02D2538:88a-21: lam de la gnas pa yin pa'i phyir de skad brjod do //
T02D2538:88a-23: theg pa chen po'i tshul gyi mchog / ces bstod de /
T02D2538:88a-25: gsang sngags kyi theg pa ni theg pa'i mchog ste /
T02D2538:88a-26: skye med kyi don zab mo rtogs pas 'khor 'das mi phyed pa'i phyir te /
T02D2538:88a-28: de lta bu'i don ni 'jam dpal sgrib pa sel
T02D2538:88a-29: ba nyid yin no zhes yon tan gyi sgo nas
T02D2538:88a-30: bstod pa'o // de lta bu khyod lags so zhes kun la sbyar ro //
T02D2538:88a-31: de la 'dir theg pa zer nas theg pa'i rnam pa gzhan cig kyang gzhag ste /
T02D2538:88a-32: theg pa'i ngo bo ni shes rab kyi rtog pa'i khyad par dang /
T02D2538:88a-33: thugs rjes gzhan don byed mi byed dang sbyar ro //
T02D2538:88a-34: byed pa ni rgyu'i rang bzhin gyi theg pa dang rten nam thabs kyi rang bzhin de /
T02D2538:88a-35: bskyed rim 'jig rten pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang rdzogs rim 'das pa'o //
T02D2538:88a-36: thob par bya ba dang dmigs pa'i yul de 'bras bu'o //
