T02D2538:95b-18: gzugs med gzugs bzang dam pa ste //
T02D2538:95b-19: zhes pa'i skabs su 'og nas kyang ston na sku ni bsdu na gcig ste /
T02D2538:95b-20: mchog gi dang po zhes pa chos sku ste de 'jam dpal nyid do //
T02D2538:95b-21: gnas skabs su chos sku longs sku sprul sku ste /
T02D2538:95b-22: gsum po de yang 'jam dpal nyid 'chad pa ste /
T02D2538:95b-26: rnam par smin pa'i sku dang /
T02D2538:95b-27: ngo bo nyid kyi sku dang /
T02D2538:95b-29: de la longs sku ni gnas khyad par can 'og min gyi gnas padma can dang /
T02D2538:95b-31: snyon pa sku khyad par can mtshan dang dpe byad kyis brgyan /
T02D2538:95b-32: 'khor khyad par can kun du bzang po la sogs
T02D2538:95b-33: pa la chos khyad par can gnyis med kyi chos
T02D2538:95b-34: ston te / de lta bu nyid 'joms nyog longs spyod pas longs sku'o //
T02D2538:95b-35: sprul sku ni gnyis med de nyid gzhan don btsal mi dgos par lhun grub tu byed pa'o //
T02D2538:95b-36: rnam smin ni mi 'dra bar smin pa ste /
T02D2538:95b-37: gnyis med de nyid gnas ston pa 'khor chos la sogs pa mi 'dra bar smin pa'o //
T02D2538:95b-38: ngo bo nyid ni de rnams kyi don btsal na cir yang mi rnyed pa de'o //
T02D2538:95b-39: chos sku ni de ro gcig pa'i bdag nyid do //
T02D2538:95b-40: de rnams la ye shes dang spyan lnga la sogs pa yang sbyor te /
T02D2538:95b-42: ye shes ni so sor rtog pa /
T02D2538:95b-43: spyan ni shes rab spyan no //
T02D2538:95b-45: sangs rgyas ni snang ba mtha' yas so //
T02D2538:96a-19: khyab bdag ye shes lnga yi bdag / sangs rgyas lnga bdag cod pan 'chang //
T02D2538:96a-20: spyan lnga chags pa med pa 'chang //
T02D2538:96a-21: zhes pa rnams kyis de rnams kyang rje btsun 'jam dpal nyid yin par bstan to //
T02D2538:96a-22: sangs rgyas thams cad ces pa ni /
T02D2538:96a-23: 'byung ba dang 'byung ba las gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams khyod la brten zhes 'byung ste /
T02D2538:96a-24: rje btsun khyod ni sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed pa'i yab kyang yin na /
T02D2538:96a-25: byang chub sems dpar snang bas sangs rgyas kyi sras po yang yin no //
T02D2538:96a-26: nyan thos dang rang rgyal ni sku dang gsung gi
T02D2538:96a-27: sras la byang chub sems dpa' thugs kyi sras yin
T02D2538:96a-29: bgrod par bya ba rnams kyi mchog go //
T02D2538:96a-30: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi rang bzhin shes
T02D2538:96a-31: pas srid pa las byung ba'i skye gnas kyi byed
T02D2538:96a-32: rgyu med de / chos dang gang zag gi bdag
T02D2538:96a-33: gis dben pa'i phyir 'khor ba'i srid pa des sel
T02D2538:96a-34: rgyu med de / lo // gcig pu sra mkhregs zhes pa ni /
T02D2538:96a-35: 'jam dpal gyi sku de ni rdo rje las grub pa ste /
T02D2538:96a-36: thams cad kyis mi shigs shing mi phyed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2538:96a-37: skyes ma thag pa ni gdul bya dang 'tsho ba'i bsam pa skyes ma thag tu'am /
T02D2538:96a-39: 'gro ba yang rje btsun nyid do //
T02D2538:96a-40: nam mkha' ni stong pa nyid kyi ye shes las
T02D2538:96a-41: byang sems rdo rje'i bdag nyid du rang byung ste
T02D2538:96a-43: shes rab ye shes zhes pa ni /
T02D2538:96a-44: zab pa dang rgya che ba dbyer med du rtogs pa las ye shes kyi me 'bar te /
T02D2538:96a-45: bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa'i bud shing bsreg pa ni me chen po'o //
T02D2538:96a-46: man ngag tu ye shes kyi tshogs sogs pa'i dus su rang lus mes bsregs pa dang sbyar ro //
T02D2538:96b-0: ye shes de'i 'od kyis 'jig rten gsum po thams cad snang bar byed pas 'od chen @96b no ;
T02D2538:96b-1: / de yan chad padma'i rigs so drug go //
T02D2538:96b-2: ye shes ni gzung 'dzin med pa'i ye shes de man ngag tu /
T02D2538:96b-3: slar sos ye shes lus su byas //
T02D2538:96b-4: zhes pa'i tshig gi sa bon no //
T02D2538:96b-5: skar ma ni pa ba sangs te yi ge aa bsgom pa dang sbyar ro //
T02D2538:96b-6: 'di na mar ye shes kyi chos ye shes lnga bsgom pa dang sbyar te /
T02D2538:96b-7: lam me ba ni me long lta bu ste /
T02D2538:96b-8: sku gnyis kyi rten phyed cing mi tog pa'o //
T02D2538:96b-9: 'gro ba'i mar me ni chos thams cad so sor
T02D2538:96b-10: rtog pa'i ye shes kyis gsal bar byed pa'i phyir
T02D2538:96b-11: ro // ye shes sgron ni mnyam pa nyid kyi chos thams cad dang mnyam par byed pa'o ;
T02D2538:96b-12: / gzi brjid ni bya ba grub kyis gang 'dul ba la sprul /
T02D2538:96b-14: ye shes lnga po de yang 'jam dpal lo //
T02D2538:96b-16: sngags mchog ni yi ge h'um ste /
T02D2538:96b-17: de'i sngags bdag ni 'jam dpal lo //
T02D2538:96b-18: h'um ni khro bo h'um mdzad kyi sa bon te /
T02D2538:96b-19: khams gsum rnam rgyal gyi rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D2538:96b-20: lha so bdun du yang rje btsun de 'byung ngo
T02D2538:96b-21: // rig sngags ni khams gsum rnam rgyal gyi gzungs
T02D2538:96b-22: kyi dkyil 'khor na lha so bdun gyi phyogs kyi
T02D2538:96b-23: sbubs na gnas pa yang de'o //
T02D2538:96b-24: gsang sngags ni de'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor na lha
T02D2538:96b-25: so bdun rang rang gi mtshan ma nas 'bras tsam
T02D2538:96b-26: la sems gtad nas gnas pa yang de'o //
T02D2538:96b-27: don chen ni khams gsum rnam rgyal gyi las kyi
T02D2538:96b-28: dkyil 'khor na lha so bdun yang 'jam dpal lo
T02D2538:96b-29: // gtsug tor ni khams gsum rnam rgyal gyi dbu
T02D2538:96b-30: la de bzhin gshegs pa dbu rgyan gyis nga rgyan
T02D2538:96b-31: // pa'o // rmad du byung ba ni rdo rje'i gzugs te /
T02D2538:96b-32: 'od kyi gzi brjid dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2538:96b-33: nam mkha'i stong pa nyid de /
T02D2538:96b-35: des 'jig rten dang 'das pa'i gzugs ston pa'am /
T02D2538:96b-36: yang na ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs ston pa'o //
T02D2538:96b-37: sangs rgyas ni rigs lnga chos skur ro gcig pas mchog go //
T02D2538:96b-38: 'gro kun dga' ba ni blang dor shes pa'i shes rab kyi mig dang ldan pa ste /
T02D2538:96b-40: sna tshogs ni sprul pa sna tshogs kyi gzugs kyis
T02D2538:96b-41: 'gro ba dag pa bskyed pa yang 'jam dpal lo
T02D2538:97a-0: // 'jam dpal de ni drang srong chen po rnams kyis @97a * //
T02D2538:97a-2: sems can thams cad kyis brjod pa ste bstod pa'i 'os su gyur pa'o //
T02D2538:97a-3: rigs gsum ni sku gsung thugs gsum mo //
T02D2538:97a-5: gsang sngags ni 'jig rten dang 'das pa ste /
T02D2538:97a-7: dam tshig ni mi 'da' ba'i don gyis te chos
T02D2538:97a-8: thams cad byang chub sems las mi 'da' ba'i phyir
T02D2538:97a-9: ro // thams cad mi 'da' bas chen po'o //
T02D2538:97a-10: gtso bo thams cad las 'thon par gyur pa 'jam dpal de /
T02D2538:97a-11: dkon mchog gi rang bzhin te mchog tu gyur pa'i
T02D2538:97a-12: yon tan rtsis las 'das pa'i yon tan yongs la
T02D2538:97a-13: khyab pa'i yon tan gsum 'dzin to //
T02D2538:97a-14: yang na man ngag tu dam tshig gi gsang ba
T02D2538:97a-15: mi smra ba mi thos pa gsum rgyud klog pa'i
T02D2538:97a-16: dam tshig ste / de las mi 'da' la gsang
T02D2538:97a-17: sngags ni gsang sngags kyi don du bltas nas mtshan
T02D2538:97a-18: dam tshig ste / 'dogs pa ste / spros las byas pa rus bstan par //
T02D2538:97a-19: dra ba de la sngags zhes bya'o //
T02D2538:97a-22: yang na de nyid 'jam dpal gyi thugs rjes 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2538:97a-23: gtso bo dkon mchog gsum 'dzin pa ni gtso 'khor gzhung dkon mchog gsum /
T02D2538:97a-25: 'bras bu dkon mchog gsum pa ste /
T02D2538:97a-26: de la gzhung dkon mchog gsum ni gsung gi gsung bas rgyas dang sbyar ro //
T02D2538:97a-27: gsung mkhan sangs rgyas gsung rgyu chos gsung bas dge 'dun no //
T02D2538:97a-28: lam ni bskyed rim gyis lha rigs lnga dang /
T02D2538:97a-29: rigs gsum la sku lnga'i bdag nyid can ni sangs rgyas /
T02D2538:97a-31: thabs kyi byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa dge 'dun no //
T02D2538:97a-33: sangs rgyas rtogs pa de dge 'dun yang dang yang goms pa de chos /
T02D2538:97a-34: 'bras bu ni chos lngas bsdus pas sangs rgyas /
T02D2538:97a-35: sngags chos kun du bzang po la sogs pa dge 'dun no //
T02D2538:97a-36: de yang rje btsun nyid 'bras bur snang ngo //
T02D2538:97a-37: theg pa mchog gsum ni nyan thos dang rang rgyal dang /
T02D2538:97a-38: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa ston pa yang 'jam dpal lo //
T02D2538:97b-0: don yod @97b zhags pa zhes pa ni byang sems rdo rje'i rigs la bya ste /
T02D2538:97b-2: gdul bya thog ma med pa la lam du 'dzud
T02D2538:97b-3: pa'i phyir don yod pa'i rnam rgyal ba ni rdo
T02D2538:97b-4: rje'i rigs te / ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D2538:97b-5: khro bos gdul ba la de'i gzugs kyis thog ma med pa ste rgyal ba'o //
T02D2538:97b-6: 'dzin pa chen po ni rigs padma'i rigs /
T02D2538:97b-7: sgo ba ni lcags sgrog gis bya /
T02D2538:97b-9: gdul bya 'dod chags can mi gtong bar 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2538:97b-10: rdo rje zhags pa ni rin chen rigs /
T02D2538:97b-11: sgo ba ni zhags pa ci zhe na /
T02D2538:97b-12: ser sna can thogs pa med par 'dzud pa'o //
T02D2538:97b-13: rdo rje lcags kyu ni rdo rje'i rigs mi bskyod pa /
T02D2538:97b-14: sgo ba ni lcags kyu ste /
T02D2538:97b-16: gong ma'i khro bo zhe sdang can 'dzin cing thogs pa med par dkyil 'khor du 'dzud pa'o //
T02D2538:97b-17: zhags pa che ni las kyi rigs don grub /
T02D2538:97b-20: phrag dog can dgyes pa bskyed cing de lam du thogs pa med par 'dzud pa'o //
T02D2538:97b-21: de yan chad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi las kyi rigs so drug go //
T02D2538:97b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mtshan brgya dang brgyad
T02D2538:97b-23: cu rtsa gcig / tshigs bcad ni tshig rkang gcig
T02D2538:97b-24: gis ma tshang ba'i lnga bcu rtsa lnga ste le'u
T02D2538:97b-26: // rdo rje 'jigs byed ces pa mtshan de skad
T02D2538:97b-27: du grags pa'i mtshan can gyi khro bo cig yod
T02D2538:97b-28: do // gang las grags she na /
T02D2538:97b-29: rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rgyud las so //
T02D2538:97b-30: mtshan de skad du grags pa'i khro bo de dngos su gang yin zhe na /
T02D2538:97b-32: de skad ces bya ba'i khro bor sprul pa'o //
T02D2538:97b-33: 'o na khro bo de la ci'i phyir rdo rje 'jigs byed ces bya zhe na /
T02D2538:97b-34: zhi bas mi 'dul ba zhe sdang gis gdul dgos
T02D2538:97b-35: pa rnams la 'jigs byed kyi gzugs za za dang
T02D2538:97b-38: rngam rngam bzhin du sprul pa ste /
T02D2538:97b-40: shin tu gdug par gyur rnams la //
T02D2538:97b-41: zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te //
T02D2538:97b-42: shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo las //
T02D2538:97b-43: khro bo de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad //
T02D2538:97b-45: de bzhin du 'di nas mar 'di skad ces bya
T02D2538:97b-46: ba'i mtshan du grags pa'i khro bo cig yod de
T02D2538:98a-2: khro bo de la ci'i phyir mtshan de skad ces bya zhes kun la sbyar bar shes par bya'o //
T02D2538:98a-3: de la 'jigs par byed ces pa'i khro bo ni rgyud 'jam dpal 'jigs byed kyi rgyud las grags /
T02D2538:98a-5: de ni sprul pas pha rol 'jigs par byed pa'i phyir de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2538:98a-6: khro bo'i rgyal po gsang rgyud las grags /
T02D2538:98a-8: 'di shin tu mthu che ste sangs rgyas kyi khro bo kun kyang 'di mthong na 'jigs te /
T02D2538:98a-11: khro bo'i ming ni gshin rje gshed //
T02D2538:98a-12: de mthong nas ni khro bo gzhan //
T02D2538:98a-13: thams cad rang gi lag cha shor //
T02D2538:98a-15: gdong drug ces pa'i khro bo de ni 'jam dpal sgyu 'phrul dra ba las grags /
T02D2538:98a-17: gdong phyag zhabs drug gi phyir /
T02D2538:98a-18: don las mtshan du btags so //
T02D2538:98a-20: khro bo ni phyag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i rgyud las grags /
T02D2538:98a-22: de'i ba spu'i bu ga nas gzi brjed can gyi khro bo 'thon te /
T02D2538:98a-23: khro gnyer gyi rlabs bskyod pa la sogs pa gzhan 'jigs par byed pa'i phyir de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2538:98a-24: mig drug can gyi khro bo ni phyag na rdo
T02D2538:98a-25: rje dbang bskur ba'i rgyud las de nyid manydzu dpral
T02D2538:98a-26: ba na mig smin drug bzhin du gnas pa'i phyir
T02D2538:98a-27: ro // lag drug can gyi khro bo ni rdo rje rgyan gyi rgyud las grags /
T02D2538:98a-29: lag drug dang ldan pa'i phyir de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2538:98a-30: stobs dang ldan pa'i khro bo ni rig pa mchog gi rgyud las grags /
T02D2538:98a-32: stobs dang ldan pa'i phyir de skad bya'o //
T02D2538:98a-33: keng rus kyi khro bo ni bde mchog las grags /
T02D2538:98a-35: keng rus kyi gzugs kyi phyir de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2538:98a-36: mche ba gtsigs pa'i khro bo ni rdo rje sgra 'dus las grags /
T02D2538:98a-38: mche ba gnyis gtsigs shing gzhan bsdigs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2538:98a-39: ha la ha la'i khro bo ni aa mo gha p'a sha las grags /
T02D2538:98a-41: ha la ha la sgrogs pa'i phyir de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2538:98a-42: gshin rje gshed kyi khro bo ni dam tshig bkod pa'i rgyud las grags /
T02D2538:98b-0: las kyi @98b gshin rje gshed de rlag par byed pa'i phyir de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2538:98b-1: bgegs kyi rgyal po'i khro bo ni bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i rgyud las grags /
T02D2538:98b-2: chogs bdag glang sna bran dang pho nya dang bcas pa las rgyal ba'i phyir de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2538:98b-3: de bzhin du khro bo zhes pa dang /
T02D2538:98b-4: sgra 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan yang des bsgres te shes par bya'o //
T02D2538:98b-5: rdo rje shugs chen ni dam tshig chen po'i rgyud las de nyid manydzu'o //
T02D2538:98b-6: rdo rje dang 'dra ba'i shugs kyis gzhan 'dul ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2538:98b-7: de yan chod kyis rdo rje'i rigs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la mtshan bcu bzhi'o //
T02D2538:98b-8: 'jigs byed zla gsang thig le las de nyid manydzu'o //
T02D2538:98b-9: sdang ba thams cad rlag par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2538:98b-10: rdo rje grags pa ni gnyis su med par thams cad mnyam pa'i rgyud las de nyid manydzu'o //
T02D2538:98b-11: mi phyed cing khyad par grags pa chen po'i phyir ro //
T02D2538:98b-12: rdo rje snying po ni zla gsang las /
T02D2538:98b-13: de nyid rdo rje snying dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2538:98b-14: sgyu 'phrul rdo rje ni khri drug stong pa las /
T02D2538:98b-15: de nyid med pa las thams cad sprul pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2538:98b-16: gsus po che de nyid las manydzu /
T02D2538:98b-17: gsus pa chen po dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2538:98b-18: rdo rje las skyes ni 'byung po 'dul byed las /
T02D2538:98b-19: rdo rje zhus pa las bskrun cing skyes pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2538:98b-20: rdo rje'i bdag ni sa 'og gi rgyud las /
T02D2538:98b-21: de nyid phyag na rdo rje bsnams pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2538:98b-22: rdo rje snying po ni snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las /
T02D2538:98b-23: mkhregs shing sra ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2538:98b-24: mkha' 'dra ba ni gsang ba mdzod kyi rgyud las 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2538:98b-25: mi g-yo ba ni rgyud sgyu 'phrul 'dra ba las /
T02D2538:98b-26: bdud kyis mi g-yo ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2538:98b-27: ral pa gcig gis bsgyings pa ni rdo rje cod pan las /
T02D2538:98b-28: de nyid las ral pa thams cad gcig tu bcings shing sgeg pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2538:98b-29: glang chen ko rlon gos su gon pa ni 'khor
T02D2538:98b-30: lo sdom pa las phyag gnyis kyis glang chen gyi
T02D2538:98b-32: drag chen ni rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las ma rungs pa 'dul ba'i khro ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2538:98b-33: ha ha zhes sgrogs pa ni de nyid las rgyun mi 'chad par sgrogs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2538:98b-34: de yan chad rdo rje'i rigs kyi mtshan bcu bzhi'o //
T02D2538:99a-0: hi hi zhes sgrogs ni zla gsang las rgyun mi 'chad pa'i @99a * //
T02D2538:99a-2: 'jigs par byed pa ni kun nas btus pa las 'jigs pa'i gzugs du mar sprul pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2538:99a-3: gad mo chen mo ni gsang ba bkod pa'i rgyud las gad mo'i ming aatta ha sa zhes pa /
T02D2538:99a-4: aom dang h'um gi bar du bcug na dug 'phrog pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2538:99a-5: gad rgyangs can ni de nyid las gad rgyangs kyi mthar ring ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2538:99a-6: rdo rje gad mo ni de nyid las gnyis med kyi gad mo'i phyir ro //
T02D2538:99a-7: cher sgrogs ni de las 'jig rten gsum gang bar sgrogs pa'o //
T02D2538:99a-8: rdo rje sems dpa' ni dpal mchog las thams cad kyi dbugs 'don pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2538:99a-9: sems dpa' chen po ni gsang 'dus las /
T02D2538:99a-10: dam tshig chen po 'dzin pa'i phyir ram mnyam pa nyid 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2538:99a-11: rdo rje rgyal po ni gsang ba mdzod kyi rgyud las /
T02D2538:99a-12: rdo rje ni gnyis med de nyid la rgyal po zhes bya'o //
T02D2538:99a-13: bde ba chen po ni dpal mchog las ;
T02D2538:99a-14: zag med kyi bde ba dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2538:99a-15: rdo rje drag po ni rdo rje gsang ba rgyan gyi rgyud las /
T02D2538:99a-17: dga' ba chen po ni rdo rje gsang ba'i thig le las /
T02D2538:99a-18: zag med kyi bde ba dang ldan dga' ba yang chen po'o //
T02D2538:99a-19: rdo rje h'um ste h'um zhes sgrogs pa ni sam gra ha las ;
T02D2538:99a-20: h'um mdzad rgyun du sgrogs pa ste sumbha ni h'um bzhi pa'o //
T02D2538:99a-21: mtshon du rdo rje mnga' thogs pa ni dam tshig chen po las /
T02D2538:99a-22: gong ma gnyis kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad gcod pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2538:99a-23: de yan chad rin chen rigs kyi mtshan bcu bzhi'o //
T02D2538:99a-24: rdo rje ral gri ni sgyu 'phrul dra ba las /
T02D2538:99a-25: rdo rje dang ral gri thogs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2538:99a-26: ma lus gcod pa ni de nyid las gong ma
T02D2538:99a-27: gnyis kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad gcod pa'i phyir
T02D2538:99a-28: ro // rdo rje kun 'chad ni byang chub pa las /
T02D2538:99a-29: kun gyi rgya gram 'chang ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2538:99a-30: rdo rje can ni de nyid las /
T02D2538:99a-31: rdo rje dra ba'i ye shes can no //
T02D2538:99a-32: rdo rje gcig pa ni gnyis su med pa rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las /
T02D2538:99a-33: zab pa dang rgya che ba gnyis med kyi ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D2538:99a-34: g-yul sel ba ni khams gsum rnam rgyal las /
T02D2538:99a-35: nyon mongs pa'i g-yul 'joms pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2538:99a-36: rdo rje 'bar ba mig mi bzad ni 'jigs byed
T02D2538:99b-0: las rdo rje @99b 'bar ba dang 'dra ba'i mig
T02D2538:99b-1: mi bzad pa'i 'od yod pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2538:99b-2: skra yang rdo rje 'bar ba ni phyag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i rgyud las /
T02D2538:99b-3: de dang 'dra ba'i skra mang ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2538:99b-4: rdo rje 'bebs pa ni ye shes 'bebs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2538:99b-5: 'bebs pa che ba ni phyag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i rgyud las ;
T02D2538:99b-6: dngos po thams cad kyi rang bzhin ye shes pas so //
T02D2538:99b-7: mig brgya pa ni de nyid las mig brgya dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2538:99b-8: rdo rje mig ni rdo rje dang 'dra ba'i spyan gyi phyir ro //
T02D2538:99b-9: lus ni rdo rje'i ba spu can //
T02D2538:99b-10: zhes pa ni rdo rje rgyan gyi rgyud las rdo rje ba spu 'khyil pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2538:99b-11: rdo rje'i spu ni gcig pu lus ni de nyid
T02D2538:99b-12: las gnyis med gcig pu'i ye shes kyi rtags rdo
T02D2538:99b-13: rje ba spu'am lus po dang ldan pa'i phyir te
T02D2538:99b-14: / des ni padma'i rigs kyi mtshan bcu bzhi'o //
T02D2538:99b-15: sen mo skyes pa rdo rje'i rtse ni sen mo rdo rje dang 'dra ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2538:99b-16: rdo rje snying po pags pa mkhregs pa ni rdo rje dang 'dra bar sra ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2538:99b-17: rdo rje phreng thogs ni rdo rje'i phreng ba thogs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2538:99b-18: dpal dang ldan pa ni phun sum tshogs pa drug dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2538:99b-19: rdo rje rgyan gyis brgyan te /
T02D2538:99b-20: de rnams ni rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las grags so //
T02D2538:99b-21: gang rgyangs ha ha zhes pa dpung bzangs kyi rgyud las grags pa'o //
T02D2538:99b-22: nges par sgrogs pa ni nges par grub pa las sgra dang bral bar bsgrags pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2538:99b-23: yi ge drug pa ni aa ra pa tsa n'a
T02D2538:99b-24: ma:zhes yi ge drug pa dam tshig gi rgyud las
T02D2538:99b-25: grags so // rdo rje'i sgra ni yo ga'i rgyud
T02D2538:99b-26: chen po las thig gi sgra lta bu'i phyir ro
T02D2538:99b-27: grags so // // 'jam dbyangs chen po de nyid
T02D2538:99b-28: las 'jam zhing dbyangs dang ldan pa ste zab pa
T02D2538:99b-29: dang rgya che ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2538:99b-30: sgra che ba ni dam tshig rgyan gyi rgyud las grags so //
T02D2538:99b-31: 'jig rten gsum na sgra gcig pa ni rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las /
T02D2538:99b-32: sa 'og sa bla sa stengs gsum gnyis med du gcig de'i sgra bsgrags pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2538:99b-33: nam mkha'i mtha' las sgra sgrogs pa ni /
T02D2538:99b-34: de nyid las sh'aka thub kyis gshin rje gshed la bka' stsal te /
T02D2538:99b-35: mtshan brjod bshad pa'i tshe nam mkha'i mtha' thams cad
T02D2538:99b-36: du thos pa'i sgra gshin rje gshed kyis bsgrags pa'i
T02D2538:100a-0: phyir ro // sgra dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog ni bcom ldan 'das @100a * //
T02D2538:100a-2: ye shes kyi spyod pa'i don du 'jig rten gsum 'dul ba ste /
T02D2538:100a-3: de yang rje btsun 'jam dpal nyid yin no //
T02D2538:100a-4: de yan chad kyis rdo rje rigs kyi las kyi rigs mtshan bcu bzhi ste /
T02D2538:100a-5: de ltar na tshigs bcad ni gcig lhag pa'i bcu
T02D2538:100a-6: tham pa mtshan bdun cu rtsa gcig ste le'u bdun
T02D2538:100a-7: pa rdzogs so // // yang dag bdag med ces
T02D2538:100a-8: pa rje btsun 'jam dpal la yang dag bya ba
T02D2538:100a-9: la sogs pa ni mtshan nas bod de /
T02D2538:100a-10: ci'i phyir rje btsun 'jam dpal la de skad bya ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nas bod ce na /
T02D2538:100a-11: bden pa dang de bzhin nyid dang /
T02D2538:100a-12: rtog pa med pa'i phyir de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2538:100a-14: ye shes na bya ba grub pa'i ye shes zhes bya /
T02D2538:100a-15: yang dag mtha' ste yi ge med pa ni gnyis med la yi ge mtshon du med de /
T02D2538:100a-16: ye shes na chos kyi dbyings so //
T02D2538:100a-17: ye shes lnga po de yang rje btsun nyid yin no ;
T02D2538:100a-18: / stong nyid smra ba'i zhes pa rje btsun de ni sgra med sgra'i bdag nyid du yod de /
T02D2538:100a-19: de yang stong pa nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid du yod do //
T02D2538:100a-20: kun brtags kyi stong pa'i ngos nas dngos po med
T02D2538:100a-21: pa'i stong pa nyid gzhan dbang rnam rtog gis stong
T02D2538:100a-22: zhing de med pa'i ngos nas dngos po ma yin
T02D2538:100a-23: pa'i stong pa nyid ngo bo gnyug ma ma bcos
T02D2538:100a-24: pa yongs grub tu 'dug pa'i ngos nas rang bzhin
T02D2538:100a-26: de nyid la gtso bo zhes bya khyu mchog ces bya'o //
T02D2538:100a-27: zab cing zhes pa stong pa nyid de gzung 'dzin gyis stong /
T02D2538:100a-29: ci yang med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2538:100a-30: rgya che ba ni de nyid sna tshogs su shar ro //
T02D2538:100a-31: de nyid zung du 'brel ba'i gnyis med kyi sgra rje btsun sgrogs te /
T02D2538:100a-35: sgyu ma gnyis med la sogs pa'i lta ba zil gyis gnon no //
T02D2538:100a-36: de yang skad cig mas sgyu ma gnyis med zil gyis gnon la /
T02D2538:100a-37: chos thams cad rnam par rig pa tsam gyi lugs khas len pas nyan thos dang /
T02D2538:100a-38: rnam med zil gyis gnon no //
T02D2538:100a-39: chos kyi dung chen ni byang chub sems dpa' don
T02D2538:100a-40: grub dga' ldan nas 'dzam bu'i gling du gzigs pa
T02D2538:100a-41: gsum la gzigs nas rgyal tshab tu rgyal ba byams
T02D2538:100a-42: pa dbu rgyan gyi dbang bskur nas /
T02D2538:100b-0: sgyu ma lha mdzes kyi lhums @100b su gshegs pa'i
T02D2538:100b-1: tshe 'jam dpal gyis chos kyi dung gi sgra bsgrags
T02D2538:100b-2: te / 'dzam bu'i gling du sangs rgyas kyi chos
T02D2538:100b-3: 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes stong gi 'jig rten du
T02D2538:100b-4: grags pas che ba yang yin no //
T02D2538:100b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud bzhi 'dul nas zad pa dang mi skye ba mngon du mdzad de /
T02D2538:100b-7: byang chub kyi shing drung du thugs khral chung bar
T02D2538:100b-8: bzhugs pa la tshangs bas zhu yon du gser gyi
T02D2538:100b-9: 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa phul nas gsol
T02D2538:100b-10: ba btab ste / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i gdugs phul /
T02D2538:100b-11: lha'i bu bye ba dung phyur gyis bsil g-yab kyis g-yob cing b'a r'a na s'ir byon nas /
T02D2538:100b-12: bcom ldan 'das mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs nas de'i
T02D2538:100b-13: bar du 'khor gyis nas tshangs pas gand'i'i sgras 'khor
T02D2538:100b-14: bsdus nas de yang rje btsun gyi sprul pa'o //
T02D2538:100b-15: phyogs bcu zhes pa thams cad du thos pa'i chos
T02D2538:100b-16: sgrogs pa ni rnga chen te de yang 'jam dpal
T02D2538:100b-17: lo // gzugs med ni chos sku ste ngo bor ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2538:100b-18: gzugs bzang ni longs sku ste /
T02D2538:100b-21: khyad par can gyi gzugs rkyen gyis snang ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2538:100b-22: dam pa ni ngo bo nyid kyi sku ste /
T02D2538:100b-23: btsal na cir yang mi rnyed de stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D2538:100b-24: sna tshogs gzugs can ni sprul sku ste /
T02D2538:100b-25: gdul bya la sna tshogs pa'i gzugs yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2538:100b-26: yid las skyes rnam smin gyi sku de ye shes de nyid dang /
T02D2538:100b-27: der mi 'dra bar smin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2538:100b-28: de lta bu'i sku lnga po de yang rje btsun no //
T02D2538:100b-29: gzugs rnams thams cad snang ba'i dpal //
T02D2538:100b-30: zhes pa ni spyi dum bu bzhi ste /
T02D2538:100b-31: gong du chos kyi dbyings dum bu dang /
T02D2538:100b-33: rdo rje rigs kyi dum bu gnyis bstan /
T02D2538:100b-34: 'og nas rin chen rigs dang don thams cad grub pa'i dum bu ston /
T02D2538:100b-35: padma'i rigs 'di ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dum bu zhes bya ste sna tshogs su snang ;
T02D2538:100b-36: snang tsam na gzhi cir yang ma grub pas gzugs brnyan te de 'char ba yang rje btsun no //
T02D2538:100b-37: de lta bu'i rje btsun de gzhan gyis mtshungs pa
T02D2538:100b-38: med cing bsod nams kyi phung po che bar yang
T02D2538:100b-39: grags so zhe'o // de ni khams gsum gyi dbang phyug chen po zhes kyang bya'o //
T02D2538:101a-1: pa ni lam thams cad ston cing mthong ba'i phyir te /
T02D2538:101a-2: lam de yang gang zhe na /
T02D2538:101a-4: yang dag pa'i lta ba nas yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar du'o //
T02D2538:101a-5: de la ni rje btsun de grags so zhe'o //
T02D2538:101a-6: thar pa zhes pa de las thar der gyur son zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2538:101a-8: chos kyi tog dang rgyal mtshan pa //
T02D2538:101a-10: gnyes med kyi 'jam dpal de nyid lha la sogs
T02D2538:101a-11: pa 'jig rten gsum na gzhon lus gdul ba la
T02D2538:101a-13: nyan thos kyis 'dul ba la yang nyan thos sde
T02D2538:101a-14: bzhi'i 'khor na gnas brtan chen po'i gzugs kyis chos
T02D2538:101a-15: ston / rang rgyal gyis 'dul ba la rang rgyal rgan po dang /
T02D2538:101a-17: byang chub sems dpas 'dul ba la ri bong la sogs pa'i skyes rabs sam /
T02D2538:101a-18: skye dgu 'dul ba'i de thams cad kyi jo bo'am bdag por gyur pa ni rje btsun no //
T02D2538:101a-19: de dang des 'dul ba la de dang de'i slob dpon mdzad pa de mi rigs snyam pa la /
T02D2538:101a-20: cir snang yang gzhi ma grub pa'am ma nges pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2538:101a-21: 'o na sangs rgyas kyis slob dpon mi mdzad dam snyam pa la /
T02D2538:101a-22: sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang ba //
T02D2538:101a-24: zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa nas /
T02D2538:101a-25: ba'i rdzi ma lta bu'i bar du sum cu rtsa
T02D2538:101a-26: gnyis ni gtso bo la dpe byad kyis bskor ba'i
T02D2538:101a-27: sku 'chang ba yang rje btsun no //
T02D2538:101a-28: de la mtshan dpe la yang 'jig rten pa dang 'das pa'o //
T02D2538:101a-29: de la 'jig rten pa'i mtshan dpe ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la yang mnga' la /
T02D2538:101a-30: 'das pa ni sangs rgyas la mnga' ba de'o //
T02D2538:101a-31: 'o na khyad ci yod ce na /
T02D2538:101a-32: thub mtshan yul la gnas pa ni //
T02D2538:101a-33: gsal ba rdzogs pas 'phags pa yin //
T02D2538:101a-35: thub pa sangs rgyas rnams kyi mtshan ni yul na brtan par gnas pa dang /
T02D2538:101a-36: gsal ba dang rdzogs pa yin la /
T02D2538:101a-37: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yul na mi gnas te /
T02D2538:101a-40: ma rdzogs pa'i khyad yod do //
T02D2538:101a-41: sdug gu 'jig rten gsum na mdzes //
T02D2538:101a-42: zhes pa 'jig rten gsum gyi sems can thams cad kyi mngon bar 'dod par bya ba'am /
T02D2538:101b-0: lta bas mi ngoms shing chog mi shes @101b pa'i phyir sdug cing mdzes pa'o //
T02D2538:101b-1: 'o na de 'jig rten pa'i slob dpon mi byed dam zhe na /
T02D2538:101b-2: 'jig rten shes legs slob dpon te //
T02D2538:101b-3: zhes pa nas mar gsungs te /
T02D2538:101b-4: 'jig rten pa'i shes legs ni yon tan te /
T02D2538:101b-5: skal ba dang ji ltar 'tsham pa bzhin du bzo
T02D2538:101b-6: dang thabs la sogs pa thams cad kyi slob dpon
T02D2538:101b-7: mdzad de / manydzu'i byin rlabs yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2538:101b-8: 'o na de nyes skyon can du mi 'gro'am snyam pa la /
T02D2538:101b-11: sbrul pa sna tshogs kyis sems can gyi don byed kyang de la snyam pa'am /
T02D2538:101b-12: don byed kyang chags pa med de padma bzhin no //
T02D2538:101b-13: man ngag tu ni slob dpon mtshan nyid dang ldan
T02D2538:101b-14: yang 'di nyid kyis mtshon la lta ba rtogs pa'i
T02D2538:101b-15: rnal 'byor pas ni 'jig rten pa'i chos thams cad
T02D2538:101b-16: kyi slob dpon byed cing 'dul la skye med kyi
T02D2538:101b-17: gsal 'debs pas gsal byed kyi rgyun du yang 'dug
T02D2538:101b-18: ste / snang ba thabs la brten nas stong pa shes rab rtogs par byed do //
T02D2538:101b-19: de ltar rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa la mi mthun pa'i 'jigs pa yang med do //
T02D2538:101b-20: de'i phyir rje btsun de ni mgon skyabs zhes bya'o //
T02D2538:101b-21: stong pa skye med rtogs na nga rgyal la sogs
T02D2538:101b-22: pa'i brag 'joms pa'i phyir yid gcugs pa zhes bya'o
T02D2538:101b-23: // de'i phyir de la ni skyabs dang bskal pa
T02D2538:101b-24: bzang po'i sangs rgyas kyi rgyun mi gcod pa'i phyir
T02D2538:101b-25: skyob pa dang ye shes chen po thob pa'i phyir
T02D2538:101b-27: nam mkha'i mtha' la longs spyod pa //
T02D2538:101b-28: zhes bya bas ni nam mkha' dang 'dra ba'i zab
T02D2538:101b-29: mo stong pa nyid kyi ye shes la legs par
T02D2538:101b-31: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mtsho //
T02D2538:101b-32: zhes pa shin tu yangs pa'i ye shes mnga' ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2538:101b-33: ma rig sgo nga'i sbubs 'byed pa //
T02D2538:101b-34: zhes bya ba ni bya'i rgyu sgo nga'i sbubs yin pa bzhin /
T02D2538:101b-35: rigs drug ni sems can thams cad kyi byed rgyu
T02D2538:101b-36: yang ma rig pa de sgo nga'i sbubs dang 'dra
T02D2538:101b-37: ba la 'du byed 'joms pa ni 'jam dpal lo
T02D2538:101b-38: // srid pa nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'o //
T02D2538:101b-39: de nyid las mi thar ba'i phyir dra ba can
T02D2538:101b-40: de yang dag pa'i don bsgoms pas nyon mongs pa
T02D2538:102a-1: pa ni ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed nas /
T02D2538:102a-2: rga shi'i bar gyi rten 'brel nyon mongs pa de rje btsun gyis zhi bar byed do //
T02D2538:102a-3: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho pha rol phyin //
T02D2538:102a-4: zhes pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i skam sar phyin pa ni rje btsun no //
T02D2538:102a-5: ye shes dbang bskur zhes pa ni kun du bzad po'i ye shes la /
T02D2538:102a-6: de dbang bskur ba'i dbu rgyan dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2538:102a-7: dbu rgyan de yang rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te /
T02D2538:102a-8: rigs lnga rgyan du thogs pa yang rje btsun no //
T02D2538:102a-9: man ngag tu 'dis slob ma dbang bskur ba mtshon te /
T02D2538:102a-10: ye shes dbang ni rigs pa'i dbang lnga'o //
T02D2538:102a-11: cod pan ni dar dpyangs so //
T02D2538:102a-12: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyan du thogs //
T02D2538:102a-13: zhes pa ni dbu rgyan rigs lngas dbang bskur ba de bkar te bstan pa'o //
T02D2538:102a-14: ye shes lnga bskyed cing bzhag pa dang ma rig pa lnga 'khyud pa'i phyir dbang po'o //
T02D2538:102a-15: sdug bsngal gsum gyis zhes pa sdug bsngal gyi sdug
T02D2538:102a-16: bsngal dmyal ba dang nye bar len pa'i phung po
T02D2538:102a-17: lnga sdug bsngal te ming dang mtshan nyid kyi sdug
T02D2538:102a-19: 'bras bu sdug bsngal gyi bden pa ste de yang rje btsun no //
T02D2538:102a-20: sdug bsngal ni kun 'byung la bya ste /
T02D2538:102a-21: 'bras bu sdug bsngal bskyed pa'i phyir 'bras bu'i ming rgyu la btags pa'o //
T02D2538:102a-22: zhi ba ni 'gog pa la bya ste /
T02D2538:102a-23: rgyu 'bras kyi sdug bsngal gong ma gnyis zhi ba ste de yang 'jam dpal lo //
T02D2538:102a-24: gsum sel ni gong gi bden pa sdug bsngal lam gyi bden pas sel lo //
T02D2538:102a-25: mtha' yas ni chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong la bya ste /
T02D2538:102a-26: glang po ches srung gis theg tshad kyi snag tshas bris pa'i chos la bya /
T02D2538:102a-27: gsung de yang rje btsun no //
T02D2538:102a-28: grol gsum ni nyan thos rang rgyal byang chub sems dpa'i rnam grol gsum ste /
T02D2538:102a-29: de thob pa yang rje btsun no //
T02D2538:102a-30: sgrib pa ni nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa ste /
T02D2538:102a-31: sdug bsngal las kyi sgrib pa ste /
T02D2538:102a-32: mtshams med pa'i las dang rnam par smin pa'i sgrib pa de dmyal ba dang /
T02D2538:102a-33: shes bya'i sgrib pa de dngos po gnas thabs dang
T02D2538:102a-34: 'gal ba'i lta ba dang snyems par 'jug pa'i lta
T02D2538:102a-35: ba ste / zhi gnas shas che ba'am /
T02D2538:102a-36: lha tshe ring po de rnams las grol ba ni rje btsun no //
T02D2538:102b-0: de rnams las grol ba nyid @102b kyis ni /
T02D2538:102b-1: mkha' ltar mnyam pa nyid la gnas //
T02D2538:102b-3: nyon mongs dri ma ni rtsa ba'i nyon mongs pa drug / nye ba'i nyon mongs nyi shu ste /
T02D2538:102b-4: rtsa drug po de las rje btsun 'das shing bral ba ste /
T02D2538:102b-5: de yan chad padma'i rigs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i
T02D2538:102b-6: rigs kyi mtshan nga bzhi dus gsum yar btags pas
T02D2538:102b-7: nga lnga'o // dus gsum ni rang gi byang chub kyi sems nyid du snang la /
T02D2538:102b-8: dus med pa ni 'das pa 'gags te med /
T02D2538:102b-9: da ltar mi gnas te med /
T02D2538:102b-10: ma 'ongs pa ma skyes te med /
T02D2538:102b-11: de ltar dus gsum shes bya rang gi mtshan nyid la med do //
T02D2538:102b-12: gal te rgyu yod pa las skye'am med pa las skye /
T02D2538:102b-13: yod pa las skye na bdag las skye'am gzhan las skye /
T02D2538:102b-14: bdag las skye na rgyu 'bras dus mnyam pas skye ba mi rung /
T02D2538:102b-15: gzhan las skye na rgyu mthun pa las skye'am mi mthun pa las skye /
T02D2538:102b-16: mthun pa las skye na phan 'dogs nas skye'am phan mi 'dogs pa las skye /
T02D2538:102b-17: phan 'dogs pa las skye na rgyu yod tsam na 'bras bu med /
T02D2538:102b-18: 'bras bu yod tsam na rgyu 'gags te de med des phan mi thogs so //
T02D2538:102b-19: de ltar dus gsum med par rtogs pa yang rje btsun no //
T02D2538:102b-20: des rtogs pa khyad par can rnyed pas sems can kun gyi gtso bo zhes bya'o //
T02D2538:102b-21: yon tan ni 'jig rten pa'i yon tan no //
T02D2538:102b-22: thod ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yon tan te /
T02D2538:102b-23: 'jig rten pa'i yon tan de bas mdzes pa de ni rin po che'i thod dang 'dra la /
T02D2538:102b-24: de'i thod du gyur pa ni rje btsun gyi yon tan te /
T02D2538:102b-25: me tog gi thod kyis rin po che'i thod la brgyan na mdzes pa bzhin no //
T02D2538:102b-26: lus kun las ni rnam grol zhes pa lus ni chos kyi lus te /
T02D2538:102b-27: dge bcu las grub pa lha'i lus dang nor gyi
T02D2538:102b-28: lus ni phyug po lta bu sbyin pa las grub
T02D2538:102b-31: 'jigs pa'i lus te yi dgas dang /
T02D2538:102b-32: dmyal bde kun la mi 'jigs shing mi 'gyur bas
T02D2538:102b-33: rje btsun ni de rnams las grol ba zhes bya'o
T02D2538:102b-34: // nam mkha'i mtha' la rab gnas pa //
T02D2538:102b-35: zhes pa skye med kyis rtogs pa dang ldan pas
T02D2538:102b-36: chos thams cad rang bzhin med par shes pa'i shes
T02D2538:102b-37: rab ni nam mkha' sgom la /
T02D2538:102b-38: nam mkha' ni shes rab bsgom pa ste /
T02D2538:103a-0: shes rab pha rol phyin pa @103a * //
T02D2538:103a-1: la chos thams cad sgom pa rnam par bsgom pa
T02D2538:103a-2: ni nam mkha' sgom pa'o zhes gsungs pa lta bu
T02D2538:103a-3: ste / 'di ni nam mkha' lam du khyer ro //
T02D2538:103a-4: yid bzhin nor bu zhes pa nas mar gong gi
T02D2538:103a-5: nam mkha' lam du khyer ba rtogs pa'i phan yon
T02D2538:103a-7: rje btsun nyid la yid bzhin nor bu dang /
T02D2538:103a-9: bum pa bzang po zhes brjod pa dang /
T02D2538:103a-10: yang na phyi rol rin po che dang /
T02D2538:103a-12: bum par yang rje btsun sprul nas gzhan don byed ces bya ba lugs gsum du shes par bya'o //
T02D2538:103a-13: yang dam tshig 'di rnams kyi man ngag tu nor
T02D2538:103a-14: lha a'arya dzambha la mchod pa yang zin par shes
T02D2538:103a-15: par bya'o // de la yid bzhin nor bu ni
T02D2538:103a-16: ci 'dod pa'i don grub par byed pa ste rje
T02D2538:103a-17: par bya'o // btsun no // khyab bdag ni de
T02D2538:103a-18: brtan g-yo la khyab pa gong du bshad pa bzhin
T02D2538:103a-19: par bya'o // btsun no // no // kun gyi
T02D2538:103a-20: ni 'dir 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dum bu yin pas
T02D2538:103a-22: rin po che dang bkres skom la phan 'dogs pas dpag bsam shing dang /
T02D2538:103a-24: de rnams kyis sems can thams cad kyi don byed do //
T02D2538:103a-25: phan 'dogs pa ni tshe phyi ma'o //
T02D2538:103a-26: mnyes gshin pa ni byams pa'i phyir rje btsun la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2538:103a-27: bzang ba ni dge ba bcu /
T02D2538:103a-28: ngan pa ni mi dge ba de yang dgos pa'i dbang gis shes pa'o //
T02D2538:103a-29: dus shes pa ni ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa dang chos ston pa dang /
T02D2538:103a-30: sems can gyi don byed pa dang /
T02D2538:103a-31: btang snyoms su gnas pa dang /
T02D2538:103a-32: mya ngan las 'das pa gang gis 'dul ba'i dus shes ba'o ;
T02D2538:103a-33: / khyab bdag ni don go ba'o //
T02D2538:103a-35: sngags phyag rgya rnams ni dam tshig ste de shes la /
T02D2538:103a-36: de las mi 'da' ba'i dam tshig dang rje btsun ldan no zhe'o //
T02D2538:103a-37: dus shes pa ni dus su sbyin pa dang /
T02D2538:103a-39: yid du 'ong ba sbyin pa dang /
T02D2538:103a-40: rnam smin la mi re ba shes pa yang rje btsun no //
T02D2538:103a-41: sems can dbang don ni dbang po rab 'bring tha
T02D2538:103a-42: ma shes shing de la nyan thos rang rgyal byang
T02D2538:103a-43: chub sems dpa'i rnam grol rnam pa gsum ston pas
T02D2538:103a-44: mkhas pa'o // yon tan ldan pa ni sangs rgyas kyi sku dang /
T02D2538:103a-45: ye shes kyi yon tan dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2538:103b-0: @103b yon tan shes pa ni phyir rol bu stegs pa dang /
T02D2538:103b-1: nyan thos dang rang rgyal la sogs pa'i yon tan shes pa'o //
T02D2538:103b-2: chos shes pa ni 'jig rten pa'am 'das pa'am /
T02D2538:103b-4: bkra shis pa ni thun mong ma yin pa'i mtshan dang ldan pa yang manydzu'o //
T02D2538:103b-5: bkra shis 'byung ba ni 'jig rten pa'i bkra shis pa yang manydzu las byung ba'o //
T02D2538:103b-6: bkra shis kun gyi nang na shin tu yang bkra shis pas manydzu'o //
T02D2538:103b-7: grags pa tha na ri bong gi lus su sprul nas kyang sems can gyi don byed pa'o //
T02D2538:103b-8: bkra shis ni sems rtse gcig tu khyod bsgoms na
T02D2538:103b-9: phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyi rten byed pa'i
T02D2538:103b-10: phyir ro // snyan grags ni gong gi sbyin pa
T02D2538:103b-11: mthar phyin pas bsod nams kyi phung po snyan par
T02D2538:103b-13: dge ba ni bcu de yang 'jam dpal lo //
T02D2538:103b-14: dbugs 'byin chen po zhes pa chags sems can gyi
T02D2538:103b-15: sems can 'dod chags kyi tshul gyi sgo nas 'khor
T02D2538:103b-16: ba las dbugs 'byin pa'i phyir chen po zhes bya'o
T02D2538:103b-17: // dga' ston ni dad pas sangs rgyas mchod pa la dga'/
T02D2538:103b-18: thugs rjes sems can la sbyin pa la dga' bas che'o //
T02D2538:103b-19: dga' chen ni 'jig rten pa'i skal ba ji ltar
T02D2538:103b-20: 'tsham pa'i gzugs kyis bla na med pa'i chos ston
T02D2538:103b-22: rol mo ni zag med kyi bde ba'i rol myang ba dang ldan pas che'o //
T02D2538:103b-23: bkur sti ni khams gsum na bkur sti dang phyag
T02D2538:103b-24: dang mchod pa'i 'os su 'dug la rim gro yang
T02D2538:103b-25: de nyid la sogs pa'i 'bras bu rim gro'i gnas
T02D2538:103b-26: su grub par byed pas de skad bya'o //
T02D2538:103b-27: tshogs thams cad kyi rten du 'dug pas phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya'o //
T02D2538:103b-28: mchog tu dga' ba ni sa dang po thob pas
T02D2538:103b-29: zhing brgya sbyong ba la sogs pa'i ngo bor 'dug
T02D2538:103b-30: la / yang na dga' ba ni shr'i ste lha
T02D2538:103b-31: mo la brten pa'i bde ba dang yid bde ba
T02D2538:103b-32: skye bar grags pas mchog tu dga' ba zhe'o ;
T02D2538:103b-33: / de'i bdag por yang 'jam dpal 'gyur ro //
T02D2538:103b-34: mchog ldan ni go 'phang gi 'gro bar bya ba thams cad kyi nang na mchog tu ldan no //
T02D2538:103b-35: mchog sbyin ni gdul bya'i bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par byed pa'o //
T02D2538:104a-0: nyan thos rang rgyal byang chub sems @104a * //
T02D2538:104a-1: dpa' kun gyi nang na mchog tu gyur pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2538:104a-2: skyabs ni dman pa dang sdug bsngal ba'i skyabs med pa rnams kyi 'os su yang 'dug go zhe'o //
T02D2538:104a-4: 'jig rten du lha 'khrugs pas 'jigs pa brgyad kyi dgra byung ste /
T02D2538:104a-10: byi ba rnams zad pa'i mchog gam rab ni manydzu'o //
T02D2538:104a-11: 'jigs pa ma lus sel zhes pa /
T02D2538:104a-20: 'jigs pa brgyad po de rnams rje btsun la gsol ba btab na sel bas de skad bya'o //
T02D2538:104a-21: gtsug phud ni byis pa gzhon nu /
T02D2538:104a-22: phud pu ni lha'i bu gzhon nu de cis 'dul
T02D2538:104a-23: ba'i sems kyi gzugs kyis sems can gyi don byed
T02D2538:104a-24: pa'o // lcang le ni ral pa'i tshogs mnga' ba /
T02D2538:104a-25: ral pa ni gcig pu sbams pa /
T02D2538:104a-26: munydza nam thor cog grol ba /
T02D2538:104a-27: yang na thod pa can gyi spyod pa byed pa'o //
T02D2538:104a-28: cod pan ni cod pan de nyi ma dang zla
T02D2538:104a-29: ba tshes gcig pa'i dbu rgyan gyis mu stegs pa'i
T02D2538:104a-31: de yang manydzu'i byin rlabs so //
T02D2538:104a-32: gdong lnga zhes pa'i tshig gnyis kyis sbyor ba dang
T02D2538:104a-33: por dang po'i sangs rgyas bsgom pa'i kha dog ston
T02D2538:104a-34: te ye shes lnga'i rtags phyogs bzhi'i steng gi zhal
T02D2538:104a-35: dang lnga ste / de re re la ral pa'i gtsug phud re re bsgom /
T02D2538:104a-36: de yan chad kyis padma'i rigs kyi rdo rje'i rigs kyi mtshan ma'o //
T02D2538:104a-37: zur phud lnga pa ni gong gi gtsug phud re re la /
T02D2538:104a-38: rin po che'i zur phud re re'o //
T02D2538:104a-39: de'i rtsa bar me tog gis bcings pa bsgom mo //
T02D2538:104a-40: mgo zlum ni mgo reg ste /
T02D2538:104a-41: sh'aka thub kyi brtul zhugs pa'o //
T02D2538:104a-42: brtul zhugs chen po ni sngags kyi he ru ka'i brtul zhugs te /
T02D2538:104a-43: thod pa'i spyod pas zhing dang nye ba'i zhing na spyod pa yang mnydzu'o //
T02D2538:104a-44: tshangs pa'i spyod pa ni bskal ba mtha' yas par
T02D2538:104a-45: sh'aka thub kyi tshangs pa'i spyod pa la yun ring
T02D2538:104a-48: brtul zhugs mchog ni sh'aka thub kyi lo bcu gnyis
T02D2538:104a-49: su tshangs spyod kyi dka' thub kyi brtul zhugs khyim
T02D2538:104a-50: du ngal ma bso bar slong mo dang /
T02D2538:104a-51: nags khrod na rgyu ba'i mchog go //
T02D2538:104b-0: dka' thub @104b mthar phyin pa ni 'jig rten pa'i dka' thub dbang po nye bar zhi ba ste /
T02D2538:104b-1: de mthar phyin pa ni rje btsun no //
T02D2538:104b-2: dka' thub chen po'i chu bo'i 'gram du sh'aka thub
T02D2538:104b-3: kyis lo drug tu til phyed phyed gsol ba de
T02D2538:104b-4: yang manydzu'o // rje btsun de ni gtsang gnas dam pa zhes bya ste /
T02D2538:104b-5: gtsang gnas ni phyi rol pa'i rig byed dang /
T02D2538:104b-6: mu stegs kyi brtul zhugs mthar phyin pa yang de'o //
T02D2538:104b-7: dam pa ni de'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa de'i gong na gzhan med pa'o //
T02D2538:104b-8: goo ta ma zhes bya ba ni rigs ngan pa'i mtshan yin te /
T02D2538:104b-9: de yang rgyal po rna ba can zhes bya ba la sras goo ta ma dang /
T02D2538:104b-10: ba ra dva dza zhes bya ba gnyis btsas nas yod pa las /
T02D2538:104b-11: nu bo ba ra dva dza rgyal srid la bcug
T02D2538:104b-12: nas pho bo goo ta ma drang srong nag po
T02D2538:104b-14: dgon par spyil por bzhugs nas bsgoms pa las yul
T02D2538:104b-15: de na skyes pa padma'i yan lag cas bya bas
T02D2538:104b-16: smad 'tshong ma 'gro ba bzang mo la smad rin
T02D2538:104b-17: bcal nas / skyes pa gzhan gyis kyang rin bcal nas /
T02D2538:104b-18: mo'i bsam pa la ngas nub gcig la skyes pa gnyis mi skyong bas na /
T02D2538:104b-19: g-yog mo padma'i yan lag la jo mo do nod mi khom byas pas /
T02D2538:104b-20: skyes pa gzhan zhig dang yud cig nyal nas song ngo //
T02D2538:104b-21: da ni gnyis ka skyong snyam nas /
T02D2538:104b-22: padma'i yan lag sbran pas khros nas ral gris 'gro
T02D2538:104b-23: ba bzang mo'i rke bcad nas bros nas goo ta
T02D2538:104b-24: ma'i spyil po'i sgo khar ral gri bor bas khrag
T02D2538:104b-25: rjes bcad pas chad pa goo ta ma la bcad
T02D2538:104b-26: de / rgyal po'i btson khang du gsal shing mang
T02D2538:104b-27: po btsugs pa'i steng du gcer bur bskur bas drang
T02D2538:104b-28: srong nag po'i zhal nas khyod la 'di tsam gyi
T02D2538:104b-29: chad pa 'ong ba khyod kyis las ci byas zer
T02D2538:104b-30: de / ba las / bdag gis tsho 'di la ni nyes pa byas pa med na /
T02D2538:104b-31: snga ma'i las cig ma lags sam byas pas /
T02D2538:104b-32: drang srong nag po na re 'o na khyod la yid ches pa'i dbang po su yod zer bas /
T02D2538:104b-33: khos bden pa'i stobs brjod do //
T02D2538:104b-34: da la nyes pa med na slob dpon lus gser gyi gtan pa phyis pa bzhin gyur /
T02D2538:104b-35: nyes pa yod na slob dpon gyi sku snga ma bas gnag par 'gyur /
T02D2538:104b-36: nga yang shin tu sdug bsngal zhing shi nas dmyal bar skye bar gyur cig ces brjod pas /
T02D2538:105a-0: slob dpon drang srong nag po de sku gser @105a * //
T02D2538:105a-1: gyi gtan pa phyis pa bzhin gyur /
T02D2538:105a-2: de nas goo ta ma na re bdag ngan song du mi ltung ba'i thabs cig zhu zer bas /
T02D2538:105a-3: drang srong nag po na re drang srong gi chos lugs kyi gdung 'tsho ba bu yod na /
T02D2538:105a-4: mtho ris su skye ba'i thabs yod de /
T02D2538:105a-5: khyed la gal te bu yod dam zer nas bdag
T02D2538:105a-6: byis pa chung du la rab tu byung na bu
T02D2538:105a-7: yod pa'i dpe ga la srid zer /
T02D2538:105a-8: der yang drang srong na re 'o na khyod tshul
T02D2538:105a-9: bzhin ma yin pa yid la dran nam zer bas
T02D2538:105a-10: bdag nyi mas ni steng nas gdungs /
T02D2538:105a-11: gsal shing gis ni 'og nas zugs [*gzugs?] nas de
T02D2538:105a-12: skye ba ga la srid zer der drang srong de'i
T02D2538:105a-13: rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' la sprin bsdus char zam
T02D2538:105a-14: zim phab bas / kho'i tsha ba'i gdung ba zhi bde ba skyes /
T02D2538:105a-15: tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la dran /
T02D2538:105a-16: des khu ba'i thigs pas 'og gi khrag dang 'dres /
T02D2538:105a-17: de bu ram gyi shing lo'i khar bzhag pas zla ba gnyis lon tsam na /
T02D2538:105a-18: byis pa shin tu gzugs bzang ba gnyis btsas nas
T02D2538:105a-19: rgyal po bu ram shing pa zhes bya bar btags
T02D2538:105a-20: / de nas lo mang du lon tsa na rgyal
T02D2538:105a-21: po bar dva dza 'das nas kho'i 'bangs na re
T02D2538:105a-22: drang srong nag po la goo ta ma ni rgyal
T02D2538:105a-23: srid la dbab dgos zhus pa dang /
T02D2538:105a-24: drang srong na re goo ta ma shi nas lo mang du lon te /
T02D2538:105a-25: kho la bu bu ram shing bya ba gnyis yod zer te /
T02D2538:105a-26: bu de gnyis kyis rgyal tshab byas pa las de
T02D2538:105a-27: gnyis kyi rigs la goo ta ma'i rigs zhes bya
T02D2538:105a-28: bar grags / tha ma bcom ldan 'das kyi sras kyi bar du'o //
T02D2538:105a-30: bram ze zhes ba rje btsun de rang bzhin gyis thos pa dang /
T02D2538:105a-31: dka' thub dang ldan pas yang na bram ze mi'i skye gnas dang /
T02D2538:105a-32: bram ze'i chos lugs kyi skye gnas gnyis dang ldan la /
T02D2538:105a-33: rje btsun sangs rgyas kyi skye gnas dang gzhan du
T02D2538:105a-34: sprul zhing yang skye ba'i skye gnas gnyis pa de
T02D2538:105a-35: skad bya'o // tshangs pa ni bsam gtan dang po'i lha'o //
T02D2538:105a-36: tshangs pa zhes pa ni tshangs pa la zhal lnga yod pa la /
T02D2538:105a-37: mgo gcig khyab 'jug gis bcad de /
T02D2538:105a-38: zhal bzhi nas mu stegs rig byed kyi tshig snyan dang gas dang nges brjod dang /
T02D2538:105a-40: mchod sbyin bya ba bzhi shes te rje btsun sprul pa'o //
T02D2538:105b-0: @105b mya ngan 'das pa tshangs pa thob //
T02D2538:105b-1: ces pa rgyal po zhig byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa byed pa /
T02D2538:105b-2: bram ze'i phru gu cig gis lag pa blangs pas lag pa g-yas pa bcad nas byin pas /
T02D2538:105b-3: khyod kyis lag pa g-yon pa chog lang la byin
T02D2538:105b-4: zhes zer nas bram zer smras pas rgyal po byang
T02D2538:105b-5: chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la skyo ba skyes te
T02D2538:105b-6: / ngas lag pa 'dod pa lag pa byin na g-yon gyis byin pa las ji ltar byar yod /
T02D2538:105b-7: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di dka' bar 'dug
T02D2538:105b-8: dgongs nas nyan thos su sems bskyed de bsgrubs pa
T02D2538:105b-9: las nyan thos kyi byang chub thob pa ni 'phags
T02D2538:105b-11: de'i sprul pa ni lha tshangs pa thob pa de theg pa chung ngun [?] gyi sdud po'o //
T02D2538:105b-12: grol ba ni yang na nyan thos stong pa nyid mthong ba /
T02D2538:105b-13: thar pa ni shes bya mthong spang gi 'dod chags las thar pa /
T02D2538:105b-14: rnam grol ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /
T02D2538:105b-15: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad la bya'o //
T02D2538:105b-16: rnam grol ni dus gsum gyi 'ching ba las grol te /
T02D2538:105b-17: de ltar yang phan yon las /
T02D2538:105b-18: bcings pa thams cad thar pa'o //
T02D2538:105b-20: zhi ba ni rten 'brel gyis spros pa las zhi ba'o //
T02D2538:105b-21: zhi ba nyid ni gzung 'dzin gyi rtog pa zhi ba nyid do //
T02D2538:105b-22: mya ngan las 'das pa mdor bstan pa'o //
T02D2538:105b-23: mya ngan zhi ba na mar rgyas par bshad pa ste /
T02D2538:105b-24: mya ngan las 'das pa zhi ba ni nyan thos phyogs gcig pa'o //
T02D2538:105b-25: legs par nges par 'byung ba ni rang rgyal ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
T02D2538:105b-26: nye ba ni mi bskyod pa la bya ste /
T02D2538:105b-27: zhe sdang can la 'dul ba'i mthar 'gro ba dang nye'o //
T02D2538:105b-28: bde sdug sel ba ni rin chen 'byung ldan te ser sna can la bde ba ster /
T02D2538:105b-30: mthar 'gyur ba ni snang ba mtha' yas te /
T02D2538:105b-31: 'dod chags kyis gdul bya dag 'dod chags la 'god do //
T02D2538:105b-32: de kho nas mthar thug par byed do //
T02D2538:105b-33: chags bral ni don grub ste /
T02D2538:105b-34: le lo can brtson 'grus kyis chags bral lam la dgod do //
T02D2538:105b-35: lus las 'das pa po ni rnam snang ste /
T02D2538:105b-36: bag chags las 'das shing zad par bag chags thams cad gnas 'gyur te bag chags med pa'o //
T02D2538:106a-0: thub pa med pa ni gzhan gyis sdang bar mi @106a * //
T02D2538:106a-2: dpe med ni dpe bstan du med pa'o //
T02D2538:106a-3: mi mngon mi snang zhes pa ni rje btsun gyi ngo bo gang du yang mi snang ste /
T02D2538:106a-4: snang ba dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2538:106a-5: gsal byed min pa ni gzhan la mi ltos pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2538:106a-6: de yang stong pa nyid mthong na grol ba yin ;
T02D2538:106a-7: bsgom pa lhag ma de'i don yin zhe'o //
T02D2538:106a-8: mi 'gyur ba ni stong pa nyid rang bzhin mi 'gyur la /
T02D2538:106a-9: yang na mngon sum du rtog pa mi 'gyur /
T02D2538:106a-10: kun 'gro ni gnyis med rgyun ma chad des thams cad du son pa'o //
T02D2538:106a-11: khyab pa ni brtan g-yo'i dngos po kun la khyab ste rje btsun no //
T02D2538:106a-12: phra ba ni rdul phran las kyang phra ba ste rtogs par dka' pa'o //
T02D2538:106a-13: zag med ni bde stong ngo //
T02D2538:106a-14: sa bon bral ni dge ba dang mi dge ba
T02D2538:106a-15: dang lung du ma bstan pa kun gyi sa bon
T02D2538:106a-16: bsags pa kun gzhi ste de nyid manydzu bas de
T02D2538:106a-17: dang bral ba'o // rdul med ni 'dod chags la
T02D2538:106a-18: sogs pa'i rdul gnyis med la rdul bral ni de
T02D2538:106a-19: nyid de bzhin nyid las gzhan du 'gyur ba yang
T02D2538:106a-20: dang bral ba'o // med do // stong pa nyid
T02D2538:106a-21: la rkyen gyi dri ma glo bur ba med de
T02D2538:106a-22: dang bral ba'o // med do // / de nyid manydzu'o //
T02D2538:106a-23: nyes pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa de manydzu
T02D2538:106a-24: la med la skyon ni nad la sogs pa med
T02D2538:106a-25: pa'o // shin tu sad pa ni shes bya phyin
T02D2538:106a-26: ci ma log par mkhyen la sad pa'i bdag ni
T02D2538:106a-27: nyan thos las khyad par du gyur pa'o //
T02D2538:106a-28: man ngag tu snang ba sems su sad /
T02D2538:106a-30: stong pa bde bar sad do //
T02D2538:106a-31: kun gzhi kun rig ni shes bya ma lus pa shes shing rig pas kun shes /
T02D2538:106a-32: sems can gyi bsam pa dang bag la nyal shes pas kun rig pa'o //
T02D2538:106a-33: de nyid kyis rab ste dam pa'o //
T02D2538:106a-34: rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad de /
T02D2538:106a-35: kun rdzob tu sgo lnga'i rnam shes sam /
T02D2538:106a-36: yul la 'jug pa'i tshogs drug / nyon mongs pa can gyi yid /
T02D2538:106a-37: kun gzhi rnams tha dad la /
T02D2538:106a-38: don dam du gcig ste spre'u dang 'dra'o //
T02D2538:106a-39: de la kun gzhi ni nyon mongs pa'i gzhi'o //
T02D2538:106a-40: nyon mongs pa can gyi yid ni kun gzhi la
T02D2538:106a-41: bdag tu rmongs pa ste de kha nang du bltas
T02D2538:106a-42: pa'o // don dam du de rnams kyi ngo bo chos nyid do //
T02D2538:106a-43: 'o na chos nyid de ji lta bu 'dod na
T02D2538:106a-44: snang ba dang stong pa ma bzung ma btang bas
T02D2538:106b-0: @106b 'das she'o // ye shes gnyis med tshul 'chang ba //
T02D2538:106b-1: zhes pa chos kyi dbyings stong pa ste /
T02D2538:106b-2: rang bzhin zab pa dang rgya che ba de rkyen
T02D2538:106b-3: gyis sna tshogs su snang ba de gnyis med do
T02D2538:106b-4: // tshul lam rang bzhin de 'chang ba ni rje btsun no //
T02D2538:106b-5: rnam par rtog med ni rtog pa dang mi rtog pa'i rigs su chad pa med de /
T02D2538:106b-6: rtog pa'i rang bzhin mi rtog par 'dug pas rtog
T02D2538:106b-7: pa'i ngo bos grub pa'i rang rgyud pa med do
T02D2538:106b-8: // lhun grub ni rang bzhin lhun grub dang rtog
T02D2538:106b-9: pa dang lam dang 'bras bu dang phrin las dang
T02D2538:106b-10: // sbyar te / de la rang bzhin lhun grub
T02D2538:106b-11: ni sri ka ti zhes pa sus kyang ma byas
T02D2538:106b-12: par rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'o //
T02D2538:106b-13: rtog pa ni bla ma'i rkyen gyis 'jug pa de rtog pa'i ngang la cog bzhag tu gnas so //
T02D2538:106b-14: lam ni bskyed rdzogs gnyis te /
T02D2538:106b-15: der yang shes pa nyid cog bzhag tu gnas pa'o //
T02D2538:106b-16: 'bras bu ni chos lnga ste der yang shes pa nyid der lhun gyis grub pa'o //
T02D2538:106b-17: phrin las ni rang bzhin gyi don te ;
T02D2538:106b-18: de yang dbang po rab 'bring tha ma la de dang der snang ste /
T02D2538:106b-19: rin po che bzhin rnam rtog med do //
T02D2538:106b-20: chags pa can padmo'i rigs kyis 'dul ba bzhin gzhan yang ngo //
T02D2538:106b-21: dus gsum ni mar me mdzad la sogs pas kyang
T02D2538:106b-22: sangs rgyas kyi bya ba thams cad 'jam dpal gyis
T02D2538:106b-23: byed do // sangs rgyas thog ma tha ma med //
T02D2538:106b-24: ces pa ni tshangs pa dang brgya byin la sangs rgyas 'dod pa'i log rtogs bsal ba'am /
T02D2538:106b-25: yang na thog ma dang tha ma skye 'gag med do zhe'o //
T02D2538:106b-26: de yan chad padma'i rigs kyi rin chen rigs kyi mtshan nga lnga'o //
T02D2538:106b-27: dang po'i sangs rgyas rgyu med pa ni dang po
T02D2538:106b-28: kho nar ye shes lngar sangs rgyas la gnyis pa
T02D2538:106b-29: man chad sprul sku cir yang snang ba'o //
T02D2538:106b-30: rgyu med ni rang bzhin ma grub pa rgyu de
T02D2538:106b-31: ni rim pa ste skad cig ma'i rgyud kyis skye
T02D2538:106b-32: 'gag med pa'o // ye shes mig gcig ni 'jam
T02D2538:106b-33: dpal de thob par bya ba'i don gnyis med yin
T02D2538:106b-35: de la 'dod chags la sogs pa'i dri ma med de logs su ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2538:106b-36: ye shes lus ni chos thams cad rnam par rig
T02D2538:106b-37: pa thams cad kyi lus su grub pa'i phyir ro
T02D2538:106b-38: // rje btsun de dang ldan pas can no //
T02D2538:106b-39: de bzhin gshegs pa ni gong du bshad do //
T02D2538:106b-40: tshig gi dbang phyug smra ba che'o //
T02D2538:107a-0: @107a * // smra ba che ba ni smra ba'i skyes mchog yin pas so //
T02D2538:107a-1: skyes mchog ni smra ba'i rgyal po yin pa'i phyir rgyal po ni dam pa'o //
T02D2538:107a-2: dam pa ni mchog gi gnas so //
T02D2538:107a-3: de ni smra ba'i seng ge zhes bya ste gzhan gyis smra bas mtshungs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2538:107a-4: mtshungs pa med pas seng ge zhes bya /
T02D2538:107a-5: de bzhin du yar yang bzlog go //
T02D2538:107a-6: kun du lta ba mchog tu dga' //
T02D2538:107a-7: zhes pa kun rdzob tu thugs rje dang /
T02D2538:107a-8: ye shes kyi spyan gnyis kyis 'khor 'das la gzigs so //
T02D2538:107a-9: yang don dam du chos so so yang dag bar
T02D2538:107a-10: rig la de gnyis la mchog tu dga' ba ni
T02D2538:107a-11: rje btsun no // gzi brjid ni 'od la bya'o //
T02D2538:107a-12: phung po ni de'i phreng ba la bya /
T02D2538:107a-13: blta na sdug ni ye shes lnga byang sems dang
T02D2538:107a-14: drug ro gcig pa'i 'od kha dog drug ni mdzes
T02D2538:107a-16: 'od bzang po ni thugs ka'i nyi ma'i 'od kyis dkyil 'khor gyi lha gsal ba'am /
T02D2538:107a-17: 'jig rten thams cad snang zhing gsal ba ni 'bar ba'o //
T02D2538:107a-18: dpal be'u ni sangs rgyas kyi thun mong ma yin
T02D2538:107a-19: pa'i mtshan de thams cad mkhyen pa las byung ba
T02D2538:107a-20: de skye ba'i rkyen de sangs rgyas kyi thugs ka
T02D2538:107a-21: na dpal be'u rtse gsum du yod zer ba de
T02D2538:107a-22: gzhan lugs so // 'dir ni ye shes sems dpar bzhed do //
T02D2538:107a-24: zhes ba rje btsun gyi lag na gshin rje gshed me 'od 'bar ba can mtshon cha 'am /
T02D2538:107a-26: sman pa ni gnyis te chen po dang mchog go //
T02D2538:107a-27: de la chen pos ni nyon mongs pa'i nad dug
T02D2538:107a-28: gsum 'joms la mchog ni shes bya'i sgrib pa'i nad
T02D2538:107a-30: gtso bo ni des 'gro ba 'dren pa ste cis 'dul lo //
T02D2538:107a-31: 'dis 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dum bu yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2538:107a-32: zug rdu 'byin pa ni bskyed rim gyis nyon mongs pa'i zug rdu 'byin la /
T02D2538:107a-33: rdzogs rim gyis shes bya'i zug rdu 'byin no //
T02D2538:107a-34: des na 'jam dpal ni bla na med pa'o //
T02D2538:107a-35: sman rnams ma lus zhes pa ni rje btsun nyid
T02D2538:107a-36: ga pur la sogs pa'i sman du sprul nas gzhan
T02D2538:107a-37: don byed la / yang na sman pa ni bla ma sman bskyed rdzogs /
T02D2538:107a-38: nad ba slob ma nad zug rdu gnyis gso'o //
T02D2538:107a-39: nad do cog gi sgra che ba //
T02D2538:107b-0: zhes @107b bya ba ni nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i gnyen po gnyis med do //
T02D2538:107b-1: sdu gu 'jig rten gsum gyi mchog / ces pa
T02D2538:107b-2: ni 'gro ba thams cad dang mi mnyam pas 'jig
T02D2538:107b-3: rten gsum gyi gtsug gi dbu rgyan yang mchog go
T02D2538:107b-4: // dpal ldan ni gza' dang rgyu skar du sprul
T02D2538:107b-5: nas sems can gyi tshe dang ye shes bskyed la
T02D2538:107b-7: phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mthar thug pa //
T02D2538:107b-8: zhes pa la nam mkha'i rgya mchad pas thams cad
T02D2538:107b-9: du khyab pa de'i mthar thug tu gnyis med rje
T02D2538:107b-11: chos kyi rgyal mtshan legs par 'dzugs //
T02D2538:107b-12: zhes pa gong gis khyab pa des bsod nams dang ye shes kyi rgyal mtshan 'dzugs pa'o //
T02D2538:107b-14: gdugs gcig ni tsha tram zhes bsil ba des nyon mongs pa'i tsha ba 'joms pa'o //
T02D2538:107b-15: des khebs sam zhe na yangs pa de mtshan nyid la gnyis su med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2538:107b-16: 'gro ba rnams la byams pa dang snying rjes snying po len pa'i don gyis dkyil 'khor che'o //
T02D2538:107b-17: dpal ldan padma gar gyi bdag / ces pa gar dbang ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin no //
T02D2538:107b-18: khyab bdag ni dngos po thams cad la khyab pa'o //
T02D2538:107b-19: des na rin po che'i gdugs te /
T02D2538:107b-20: de dam tshig tu gyur pa thams cad skyob pa'o //
T02D2538:107b-21: sangs rgyas kun gyi gzi brjid che //
T02D2538:107b-22: zhes pa 'byung ba dang 'byung ba las gyur pa
T02D2538:107b-23: rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams khyod la brten
T02D2538:107b-24: zhes te / sangs rgyas kyi rgyal po byang sems rdo rje la bya /
T02D2538:107b-25: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku 'chang ba ni chos thams
T02D2538:107b-26: cad kyi chos nyid stong pa nyid de 'jam dpal
T02D2538:107b-27: 'chang ngo // sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byor che //
T02D2538:107b-28: zhes pa yo ga las rnal 'byor chen po bcom
T02D2538:107b-29: ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2538:107b-30: zhes 'byung ste 'jam dpal de la gnas pas chen
T02D2538:107b-32: sangs rgyas kun gyi bstan pa gcig / ces pa bstan pa ni theg pa gsum ste /
T02D2538:107b-33: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa'i
T02D2538:107b-34: theg pa ni gnyis med kyi theg pa chen por
T02D2538:107b-35: gcig go // rtogs pa yongs su rgyas pa las /
T02D2538:108a-0: sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ni gcig ste gnyis dang gsum @108a * //
T02D2538:108a-2: des na ye shes gcig min sku gcig gdugs gcig la sogs pa sbyar ro //
T02D2538:108a-3: rdo rje rin chen mi bskyod pa de rdo rje'i rang bzhin zhe'o //
T02D2538:108a-4: des gzhan don byed pa ni rin chen no //
T02D2538:108a-5: dbang bskur dpal ni rdo rje sems te /
T02D2538:108a-6: shr'i zhes pa dpal te lha mo la bya la /
T02D2538:108a-7: des mi bskyod pa'i skal ba dang ldan par byed pas dbang bskur zhe'o //
T02D2538:108a-8: rin chen kun bdag ni rin 'byung ste /
T02D2538:108a-9: yum gyis de rnams ma thob pa ste kha lo sgyur bas bdag po'o //
T02D2538:108a-11: rin 'byung gi dbang byed pa'am bdag go //
T02D2538:108a-12: 'jig rten dbang phyug ni snang ba mtha' yas te 'khor lo de gsum la dbang sgyur la /
T02D2538:108a-13: kun gyi bdag ni dharma badzri ste snang mtha'i bdag nyid do /
T02D2538:108a-14: rdo rje 'chang ni don grub ste rdo rje rgya gram 'chang la /
T02D2538:108a-15: kun gyi rje ni karma badzri ste don grub kyi rje'o //
T02D2538:108a-16: sangs rgyas kun ni rnam snang ste sangs rgyas thams
T02D2538:108a-17: cad bsdus pa'i bdag nyid pas thugs che ba ni
T02D2538:108a-18: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma ste /
T02D2538:108a-19: gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor thugs kyi dkyil 'khor rang bzhin rnam snang yum du gzhag pa'o //
T02D2538:108a-20: de ltar rigs lnga yab yum bcu po de yang
T02D2538:108a-21: rje btsun nyid rje btsun gnyis med de yang sangs
T02D2538:108a-22: rgyas kun gyi sku che ba'i rang bzhin dang /
T02D2538:108a-23: gsung che ba'i rang bzhin yang yin no zhe'o //
T02D2538:108a-24: de ni nyi mar yang snang ngo zhe'o //
T02D2538:108a-25: de yan chad padma'i rigs nga lnga'o //
T02D2538:108a-26: rdo rje nyi ma dang rdo rje zla ba ni
T02D2538:108a-27: don ma rtogs te de la rdo rje ni gnyis
T02D2538:108a-28: med la bya / nyi ma ni thams cad du snang zhing gsal bar byed /
T02D2538:108a-29: ma rig pa'i mun pa gsal bar byed do //
T02D2538:108a-32: zla ba ni gsal ba la bya ste /
T02D2538:108a-33: dri ma med pa ni rang bzhin gyis dag pa ste /
T02D2538:108a-34: rdo rje rtse mo las kyang /
T02D2538:108a-35: dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med //
T02D2538:108a-36: ces gsungs te de nyid rje btsun no //
T02D2538:108a-37: yang na man ngag tu nyi zla gnyis po des
T02D2538:108a-38: sangs rgyas gdan nyi zla yin pa la tsha tsha
T02D2538:108a-39: 'debs pa'i man ngag nyi zla kha sbyor du bsam
T02D2538:108a-40: pa dang / mtshan 'don pa'i dus kyi thugs ka
T02D2538:108a-41: nas sngags spro ba'i gzhi rnam smin gyi sku bsgom
T02D2538:108a-42: pa yang 'di nyid kyis zin no //
T02D2538:108a-43: chags bral ni btang snyoms dang /
T02D2538:108b-0: dga' ba lam du khyer ba la @108b sogs pa ni 'jig rten pa'i lam ste dge bcu'o //
T02D2538:108b-1: chags pa chen po ni gsang sngags sgo bzhi ste chags lam mo //
T02D2538:108b-2: de rnams kyang rje btsun no //
T02D2538:108b-4: ces bya ba ni ye shes sems dpa'i sku 'od lnga 'bar ba can de yang rje btsun no //
T02D2538:108b-5: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni sh'aka thub bdud bzhis mi tshugs pas rdo rje skyil krung du bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2538:108b-6: sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i chos 'dzin zhes pa dus gsum
T02D2538:108b-7: gyi sangs rgyas thams cad mtshan 'di dus gsum du
T02D2538:108b-8: yang dag par brjod cing 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2538:108b-9: dpal ldan ni dkyil 'khor bdun gyi lhas legs pa'i yon tan thams cad ster la /
T02D2538:108b-10: padma ni manydzu de las skyes pa'am /
T02D2538:108b-11: yang na padma dang 'dra bar skyes pa ste nyes pa'i skyon med do //
T02D2538:108b-12: kun mkhyen ni rje btsun nyid thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi mdzod 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2538:108b-13: rgyal po ni dge bcu'i lam gyi sprul pa ste /
T02D2538:108b-14: thams cad 'jig rten las sgrol ba'o //
T02D2538:108b-15: de lta bu'i sgyu 'phrul sna tshogs 'chang ba ni rje btsun no //
T02D2538:108b-16: che ba sangs rgyas rig sngags 'dzin ni /
T02D2538:108b-17: sangs rgyas kyi rig sngags ni gzungs te tshig don sngags phyag rgya'i gzungs rje btsun 'dzin no //
T02D2538:108b-18: rdo rje rnon po ni zhal lnga pa ste sku phyag rgya chen po'o //
T02D2538:108b-19: ral gri ni g-yas pa bzhin nyon mongs gcod pa'i
T02D2538:108b-20: rtags las kyi phyag rgya yi ge'i mchog ni thugs
T02D2538:108b-21: ka'i dh'i:ste / gsung gi rang bzhin chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2538:108b-22: rnam par dag pa ni thugs dag par ston pa'i
T02D2538:108b-23: rtags g-yon gyi phyag na rgyal ba'i yum po ti
T02D2538:108b-24: bzhi bsnams pa ste thugs dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o
T02D2538:108b-25: ; / de rnams tshogs pa ni sku phyag rgya
T02D2538:108b-26: chen po ste dang po'i sangs rgyas phyag bzhi pa
T02D2538:108b-27: ; bzhag pa'o // dkyil 'khor gyi lha gzhan des 'dre ste shes par bya'o //
T02D2538:108b-28: theg pa chen po ni gong gi po ti de rnams autpala'i steng na bsnams pa ste /
T02D2538:108b-29: des sdug bsngal thams cad gcod pa'i lam de theg pa chen po zhes bya'o //
T02D2538:108b-30: sdug bsngal ni nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'o //
T02D2538:108b-31: mtshon cha chen po rdo rje chos //
T02D2538:108b-32: zhes pa gong gi lam des sam /
T02D2538:108b-33: ye shes kyi chos nyid kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad gcod pa de la de skad bya'o //
T02D2538:109a-0: rdo rje zab mo ni gnyis med kyi ye shes te skye ba med pa'i rang @109a * //
T02D2538:109a-2: 'dzin pa ni rgyal ba de rigs bzhi'i ye shes
T02D2538:109a-3: las rgyal ba dzin dzik de rnam snang la bya
T02D2538:109a-4: / rdo rje ni mi phyed pa de gnyis med
T02D2538:109a-5: las blo gros ji ltar gnas pa bzhin rig pa
T02D2538:109a-6: / yang manydzu'o // pha rol phyin pa ni bcu /
T02D2538:109a-7: mchod pa ni rdzogs pa rnams ni rab dga' la sogs pa bcu'o //
T02D2538:109a-8: kun gyi rgyan des dang po rab tu dga' ba
T02D2538:109a-9: la sbyin pa'i rgyan las bcu ye shes kyi rgyan
T02D2538:109a-10: gyi bar du'o // rnam par dag pa ni chos
T02D2538:109a-11: thams cad skye med du rtogs pa bdag med chos
T02D2538:109a-12: ni chos snang ba'i dus nyid na rang bzhin gyis
T02D2538:109a-13: cir yang ma grub pas mi snang ba dang 'dra
T02D2538:109a-14: ba'i snang ba la 'dra ba zhes bya ste /
T02D2538:109a-16: yang dag ces pa thugs yang dag par ye shes
T02D2538:109a-17: nyid ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i zla bar byung
T02D2538:109a-19: brtson 'grus sgyu 'phrul zhes pa ni zag med kyi brtson 'grus zhes bya ba /
T02D2538:109a-20: bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyis sprul pas sgyu
T02D2538:109a-21: ma yang yin pa la drang ba ni 'brel pa'i
T02D2538:109a-22: don to // rgyud kun gyis ni bya ba spyod pa'i rnal 'byor chen po bzhi'o //
