T02D2538:112b-6: go // sgrub thabs dang / de'i bskyed rim gyi
T02D2538:112b-7: sgo nas mtshan che ba'i yon tan du bltas te
T02D2538:112b-8: go // sgrub thabs dang / / 'don pa gnyis te de ni man ngag tu shes par bya'o //
T02D2538:112b-9: de la thig le ni sa bon te mum stong
T02D2538:112b-10: pa ni don dam pa ste ye shes kyi tshogs
T02D2538:112b-12: rnam pa kun ldan ni buddha'i mtshan dpe dang /
T02D2538:112b-13: buddha gzugs sku de dang ldan pa ste /
T02D2538:112b-14: rnam med ni don dam du mtshan dpe btsal na yon tan cir yang mi dmigs te /
T02D2538:112b-15: brtags tshod kun rdzob tu rgyun mi 'chad mi 'bral bas rnam bcas so //
T02D2538:112b-16: don dam du med pas rnam med des 'bras bu
T02D2538:112b-17: buddha'i sa ni rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i
T02D2538:112b-18: rnam med do // de bzhin du 'di ltar snang
T02D2538:112b-19: ba la yang zab dang rgya che ba gnyis sbyor
T02D2538:112b-20: rnam med do // / bcu drug phyed phyed tshig
T02D2538:112b-21: rkang gsum la phra thig gi bsgom pa lus la
T02D2538:112b-22: 'khor lo bzhi bsgom pa ston te /
T02D2538:112b-23: spyir na brten pa lha'i 'khor lo //
T02D2538:112b-25: snying gar shes rab kyi 'khor lo //
T02D2538:112b-26: lus gnas rtsa'i 'khor lo las 'dir lus gnas rtsa'i 'khor lo ston te /
T02D2538:112b-27: de yang shes rab kyi 'khor lo /
T02D2538:112b-28: snying ga shes rab kyi 'khor lo //
T02D2538:112b-29: mgrin pa shes rab kyi 'khor lo //
T02D2538:112b-30: mtshog gshes rab kyi 'khor lo rnams bsreg pa dang gso ba'i sgo nas bsgoms te /
T02D2538:112b-31: bla ma'i lung las mi 'da' ba'i phyir 'dir mi 'grel lo //
T02D2538:112b-32: de man ngag tu shes par bya'o //
T02D2538:112b-33: bcu drug ni a'a li phyed ni brgyad /
T02D2538:112b-36: tha lte ba las pa'i 'khor lo //
T02D2538:112b-37: thig le ram la ma btsud tsam gyi bar du bsam pa'i don to //
T02D2538:112b-38: bsam gtan bzhi ni tsakra sde bzhi'o //
T02D2538:112b-39: rdo rje rtse mo ni de'i 'od kyi rtse mo dmar po 'bar ba can no //
T02D2538:112b-40: des bsreg pa dang gso ba'o //
T02D2538:112b-41: rtsis las 'das pa ni yod med rtag chad gcig dang du ma /
T02D2538:112b-42: dngos dang dngos med kyi rnam rtog gi rtsis las 'das te mi rtog pa'o //
T02D2538:112b-43: yan lag med pa ni 'bras bu spros med thob pa zhe'o //
T02D2538:113a-1: gtan ni dang po gnyis pa gsum pa bzhi pa'o //
T02D2538:113a-2: yan lag ni rtog dpyod me dang 'dra /
T02D2538:113a-3: yang na g-yo ba rlung dang 'dra /
T02D2538:113a-5: brtan pa sa la sogs pa'i yan lag rim pa bzhin yod pa de shes pa yang manydzu'o //
T02D2538:113a-6: ting nge 'dzin ni gong ma de bzhi'o //
T02D2538:113a-7: rigs ni rjes su grub pa dang /
T02D2538:113a-8: ma grub pa lugs gnyis te /
T02D2538:113a-9: grub pa ni sems tsam pa'i rigs lngar 'dod de /
T02D2538:113a-10: nyan thos dang rang rgyal byang chub sems dpa' ni de dang der thob par 'dod /
T02D2538:113a-11: ma nges pa gang du yang skye bar ma nges pa la rkyen dbang du 'gro /
T02D2538:113a-12: rigs chad pas de tsho gang yang mi 'grub zer ro //
T02D2538:113a-13: dbu ma pa rigs la rdzas su grub pa med de /
T02D2538:113a-14: 'di na snod med gang la med //
T02D2538:113a-15: ces pa ste nyan thos dang rang rgyal gyis ni theg pa chen po'i lam stegs su 'dod de /
T02D2538:113a-16: de yan chad las kyi rigs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mtshan bcu dgu'o //
T02D2538:113a-17: rgyud rig pa ni gong ma de rnams kyi rigs
T02D2538:113a-18: gang du skye ba yang rje btsun gyis rig pa'o
T02D2538:113a-19: // ting 'dzin lus can lus kyi mchog ni chos sku'o //
T02D2538:113a-20: longs spyod rdzogs sku ni byang chub sems dpa'i dbus na rgyal po lta bu ste /
T02D2538:113a-22: sprul sku ni 'jig rten pa'i sku kun gyi mchog ste /
T02D2538:113a-23: de gsum yang rje btsun no //
T02D2538:113a-24: rje btsun de dus gsum ka'i buddha mar me mdzad
T02D2538:113a-25: la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i sprul pa'i buddha
T02D2538:113a-26: thams cad kyi gdung rgyud mi gcod cing 'chang bas
T02D2538:113a-27: de skad bya'o // phyogs bcu zhes pa'i tshig gnyis
T02D2538:113a-28: ni mtshan gsang sngags su lta ba dang dkyil 'khor
T02D2538:113a-29: bskyed pa'i dus su sprul pa'i sku spro ba'i don
T02D2538:113a-30: las gnyis byed pa dang bsdu ba dad bstan pa'i
T02D2538:113a-31: de skad bya'o // man ngag go // lha'i dbang
T02D2538:113a-32: po ni khyab 'jug lha'i bla ni sa bla ste
T02D2538:113a-33: tshangs pa po ni rnam par snang byed zer /
T02D2538:113a-34: lha min bdag r'a hu la /
T02D2538:113a-38: 'joms byed ma h'a de ba ste /
T02D2538:113a-39: 'jig rten pa'i lha chen po brgyad po de yang
T02D2538:113a-40: rje btsun gyi sprul pa yin pas dbang phyug ces
T02D2538:113a-41: pa'am / yang de tshol dbang sgyur ba ni rje btsun no //
T02D2538:113b-0: srid pa ni 'khor ba'i dgon pa @113b ni rgal ba'o //
T02D2538:113b-1: de las rgal bar dka' ba brgal ba yang rje btsun no //
T02D2538:113b-2: ston pa ni sems can gyi don du chos ston pa'o //
T02D2538:113b-4: gnyis su grub pa mthar phyin ni don brtsams pa mthar phyin no //
T02D2538:113b-5: 'khrul pa ni gtan la ma phebs pa ste /
T02D2538:113b-7: 'dir drug sgeg pa'i rdo rje'i 'grel pas grub pa mthar phyin pa'i man ngag go zhes gsungs te /
T02D2538:113b-8: gnyis med sus kyang ma byas ma bcos pa de
T02D2538:113b-9: gzhan gyi rgyud la rtog pa skyed pa ni man
T02D2538:113b-10: ngag go // yang dang yang du goms par byed pa ni lam mo //
T02D2538:113b-11: goms pa mthar phyin pa ni 'bras bu'o ;
T02D2538:113b-12: / nor pa sarba rnam par spangs pa ni ji
T02D2538:113b-13: ltar gnas pa'i don nyid phyin ci ma log par
T02D2538:113b-14: shes pa'o // don gsum ni don gsum mo //
T02D2538:113b-16: the tshom med pa'i blos shes par bya'o //
T02D2538:113b-17: kun don ni kun g-yo thabs kyi rje bo rje btsun no //
T02D2538:113b-18: yon tan gsum ni rdul mun pa snying stobs kyi bdag nyid kyang rje btsun te /
T02D2538:113b-19: de yang snying stobs mun pas kyang //
T02D2538:113b-20: gang phyir sems can don 'gyur ba //
T02D2538:113b-22: phung po lnga don dus gsum du //
T02D2538:113b-23: zhes pa gzugs la sogs pa yang dus gsum gyis bsdus pa'i phyir /
T02D2538:113b-24: mu stegs kyi brtags pa bsal nas nyan thos kyi bdag med tshol ba'o //
T02D2538:113b-25: skad cig thams cad bye brag phyed //
T02D2538:113b-26: ces pa rgyu'i skad cig gi dus ni sbyin pa dus su byin pa /
T02D2538:113b-27: 'gyod pa med pa yid du 'ong ba /
T02D2538:113b-28: sbyin pa rnam par smin pa la mi re bas
T02D2538:113b-29: 'bras bu'i skad cig la thos bsam bsgom gsum las
T02D2538:113b-30: byung ba'i shes rab kyis chos thams cad shes pa'o
T02D2538:113b-31: // des ni skad cig ma la spangs pa dang
T02D2538:113b-32: ye shes phun sum tshogs pa thob pas rdzogs sangs
T02D2538:113b-33: // rgyas zhes bya'o // sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin 'chang //
T02D2538:113b-34: zhes pa ste sku gsum gyi buddha kun gyi rang bzhin nam //
T02D2538:113b-35: chos sku la ni bzang ngan med kyi sprul sku la ni yod do //
T02D2538:113b-37: sangs rgyas thams cad tshogs dang ni //
T02D2538:113b-38: chos sku 'gro ba'i don byed par //
T02D2538:113b-39: mnyam pa nyid de sku tshe dang //
T02D2538:113b-40: rigs dang sku bong tshod kyis min //
T02D2538:113b-43: chos sku dang 'gro ba'i byed pa la mnyam la /
T02D2538:114a-1: bong tshod ni mi mthun zhing mi mnyam mo //
T02D2538:114a-2: lus med pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi lus yin
T02D2538:114a-3: pas tha mal gyi lus med la de'i lus de
T02D2538:114a-5: lus kyi mtha' ni spros pa'i lus thams cad chos kyi lus su rtogs pa ste /
T02D2538:114a-6: de'i phyir sprul pa'i gzugs tshogs gdul bya kun du ston zhe'o //
T02D2538:114a-7: nor bu chen po ni khams gsum chos kyi rgyal
T02D2538:114a-8: por dbang bskur ba'i ngo bo pas de la de
T02D2538:114a-10: rin chen tog ni sbyin pas gdul bya thams cad
T02D2538:114a-11: rdzogs par byed pas rje btsun la de skad bya'o
T02D2538:114a-12: // de yan chod ni rin po che'i rigs kyi
T02D2538:114a-13: mtshan brgya rtsa bzhi ste le'u dgu pa rdzogs so
T02D2538:114a-15: // / // / sangs rgyas kun gyis rtogs bya ba //
T02D2538:114a-16: zhes pa ni dpal de kho na nyid bsdus pa las /
T02D2538:114a-18: sangs rgyas thams cad khyod la brten //
T02D2538:114a-19: zhes pa ste sangs rgyas kun gyis shes par bya ba'i rgyu'am /
T02D2538:114a-20: mngon du bya ba'i rgyur 'dug pas rje btsun la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2538:114a-21: buddha kun ni mu stegs can bkag pa ste /
T02D2538:114a-23: byang chub ni nyan thos dang rang rgyal dang byang
T02D2538:114a-24: chub sems dpa'i byang chub gsum mu stegs las khyad
T02D2538:114a-25: yod pas bla na med do //
T02D2538:114a-26: yang na bla na med ni 'og ma'i byang chub
T02D2538:114a-27: la bltas nas sngags kyi theg pa ni khyad par
T02D2538:114a-28: 'phags so // gsang sngags ni 'jig rten pa'i gsang
T02D2538:114a-29: sngags khyab 'jug ma h'a de ba 'das pa'i gsang
T02D2538:114a-30: sngags mi bskyod pa la sogs pa lnga yang rje
T02D2538:114a-31: 'phags so // btsun no // de nyid dang de 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2538:114a-32: don dam du brjod pa dang bral bas yi ges mtshon du med do //
T02D2538:114a-33: gsang sngags chen po ni rigs gsum ste /
T02D2538:114a-34: rnam snang sku mi bskyod pa thugs snang ba mtha' yas gsung ste de yang rje btsun no //
T02D2538:114a-35: yang gsang sngags ni sgo bzhi'i don kun bskyed /
T02D2538:114a-36: 'byin sprul pa yang rje btsun no //
T02D2538:114a-37: thig le chen po ni a'a li k'a la ste kun rdzob tu de dang der byung /
T02D2538:114a-38: don dam yi ges mtshon du med do //
T02D2538:114a-39: stong pa ni nang la sogs pa bcu drug ste
T02D2538:114a-40: 'dzin pa'i sems la sogs pas stong pa'i phyir na
T02D2538:114a-41: chen bo ste rje btsun no //
T02D2538:114a-42: yi ge lnga ni rnam snang gi sa bon yi ge aa dang /
T02D2538:114b-0: snang @114b ba mtha' yas hr'i: don yod grub kyi aa: ste /
T02D2538:114b-1: yi ge de lnga ni lag pa byin gyis rlob pa dang /
T02D2538:114b-2: mandala dang tsha tsha'i rab gnas dang /
T02D2538:114b-3: mi zab pa'i slob dpon gyis thig tshon brlab pa'i dus dang lngar sbyar bas so //
T02D2538:114b-5: 'gro ba rnams kyi nang na bla ma zhes kyang bya'o //
T02D2538:114b-6: de yan chod rdo rje rigs kyi mtshan bcu dgu'o //
T02D2538:114b-8: phyogs ni bcu ste 'og la sogs pa thams cad du rje btsun ni rab tu grags so //
T02D2538:114b-10: sbyin bdag ces pas chos kyi sbyin pa btang bas
T02D2538:114b-11: de nyid brtan g-yo thams cad khyab bdag nyid chen
T02D2538:114b-12: po zhes bya'o // de la ni dpa' bo zhes bya ste /
T02D2538:114b-14: byams pa'i khrab gyon snying rje'i lag pa bcug shes
T02D2538:114b-15: rab kyi mtshon thogs nas nyon mongs pa dang 'thab
T02D2538:114b-16: ste / ma rig pa'i g-yul ngo de bsal nas bdud bzhi'i dgra btul te /
T02D2538:114b-17: de'i 'jigs pa bsal zhing bdud kyi dpung gi tshogs pham par byed pa'am //
T02D2538:114b-18: de bzhin du bha ga b'an gyis rdo rje gdan la bdud bzhi btul te /
T02D2538:114b-20: 'di la manydzu 'jam dpal rnon po'i sgo nas blo 'phel bar bya ba'i man ngag tu blta'o //
T02D2538:114b-21: rdzogs pa ni rigs thams cad tshang zhing rdzogs pas
T02D2538:114b-22: buddhas 'gro ba thams cad 'dren pa 'jig rten 'dren
T02D2538:114b-23: zhe'o // rje btsun de la bstod par 'os te /
T02D2538:114b-24: thos pa dang dran pa mthar phyin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2538:114b-25: 'jig rten las 'das pas mchod pa'i 'os la lha
T02D2538:114b-26: dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten pas phyag bya ba'i gnas
T02D2538:114b-27: nyan thos la sogs pas ni rim gro bya ba'i
T02D2538:114b-28: 'os so // yon tan thams cad rdzogs pas byang chub sems dpas bkur bar 'os /
T02D2538:114b-29: de yan chad rin chen rigs kyi mtshan bcu dgu'o //
T02D2538:114b-30: buddha thams cad kyis brjod par bya ba'i mchog go //
T02D2538:114b-31: rnal 'byor pas sgrub pa rnams kyis phyag bya ba'i 'os so //
T02D2538:114b-32: buddha thams cad kyi thugs las zhugs pas bla ma'i rab ces bya'o //
T02D2538:114b-33: 'jig rten gsum po thams cad du gom pa gcig
T02D2538:114b-34: kho nas 'gro ba'i rdzu 'phrul mnga' bas gom gcig
T02D2538:114b-35: bgrod ce'o // mkha' ltar bdag med rnam par gnon //
T02D2538:114b-36: zhes pa de thams cad du sems can thams cad kyi don byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2538:115a-0: @115a * // gsum rig ni sde snod gsum ste /
T02D2538:115a-1: 'dul ba mngon pa mdo sde gsum rig pa'am /
T02D2538:115a-2: yang na rig byed gsum rig ba'am /
T02D2538:115a-3: de 'don pa de yang rje btsun no //
T02D2538:115a-4: nyes skyon med pas gtsang zhing dag pa'am /
T02D2538:115a-5: dag pa'i rgyu yin te de yang rje btsun no //
T02D2538:115a-6: mngon shes drug ni lha'i mig gi mngon par shes
T02D2538:115a-7: pa nas gzhan gyi sems shes pa la sogs pa
T02D2538:115a-9: rjes dran drug ni buddha rjes su dran pa nas
T02D2538:115a-10: chos dang dge 'dun rdo rje dang khro bo dam
T02D2538:115a-11: tshig rjes su dran pa ste /
T02D2538:115a-12: de rnams rim pa bzhin sku lnga dang /
T02D2538:115a-13: ye shes 'khor lo dang rigs bdun gyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha dang /
T02D2538:115a-15: bdag bsrung ba dang dam tshig can gyi rten gyi gang zag rnams la rim pa bzhin sbyar ro //
T02D2538:115a-16: byang chub sems dpa' ni rang don la chags pa /
T02D2538:115a-17: 'og ma ni gzhan don la chags pa ni nyan
T02D2538:115a-18: thos las rdzu 'phrul chen po ni bsod nams dang
T02D2538:115a-19: ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs pa //
T02D2538:115a-20: 'jig rten las 'das pa ni 'khor ba'i chu bo las brgal ba'o //
T02D2538:115a-21: chos thams cad rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i shes rab kyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pas mtha'o //
T02D2538:115a-22: shes rab kyi ni gnyis med kyi ye shes brtsi /
T02D2538:115a-23: de mngon du gyur pa ni thob pa'o //
T02D2538:115a-24: bdag gis de nyid rig pas gzhan yang rig ste /
T02D2538:115a-25: gzhan rig ni brtags pa ste nyal bar kyang de nyid sprul pa'o //
T02D2538:115a-26: de yan chad padma'i rigs kyi mtshan bcu dgu'o //
T02D2538:115a-27: thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi rig pa'o //
T02D2538:115a-28: kun ni thams cad la phan pa byams pa de'i phyir gang zag mchog ce'o //
T02D2538:115a-29: de ni dper bya ba las mtshon du med do //
T02D2538:115a-31: shes bya ni 'dzin pa ste de'i bdag por gyur pas rab mchog ces bya'o //
T02D2538:115a-32: gtso bo ni 'gro bar bya ba'i mchog go //
T02D2538:115a-33: chos kyi sbyin pa ni skal ba dang 'tsham par btang bas bdag po zhes bya'o //
T02D2538:115a-34: phyag rgya bzhi dam tshig dang chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen po'o //
T02D2538:115a-36: de ni 'gro ba rnams kyi bsnyen bkur bya ba'i mchog go //
T02D2538:115a-37: nyan thos rang rgyal byang chub sems dpa'i nges par 'byung ba gsum gyi tshul kyang de'o //
T02D2538:115b-0: don gyi dam pa rnam dag @115b dpal ;
T02D2538:115b-1: / zhes pa don dam par chos thams cad dag pa'i dpal dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2538:115b-2: 'jig rten gsum na skal bzang che //
T02D2538:115b-3: zhes pa sems can thams cad kyi don byed nus pa ni skal ba bzang ba ste /
T02D2538:115b-4: nyan thos skal ngan dang khyad do //
T02D2538:115b-5: dpal ldan ni skal ba phun sum tshogs pa dang
T02D2538:115b-6: ldan pa 'byor ba ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten
T02D2538:115b-7: las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa kun gyi ngo
T02D2538:115b-8: bo bas de la de skad bya'o //
T02D2538:115b-9: de yan chad kyis mtshan gyi yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa ni 'jam dpal te /
T02D2538:115b-10: dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog khyod la sogs so zhes bstod pa'o //
T02D2538:115b-11: de yan chad kyis las kyi rigs kyi mtshan brjod
T02D2538:115b-12: bcu dgu la mtshan go lnga tshigs bcad bco lnga
T02D2538:115b-13: ste le'u bcu pa rdzogs so /
T02D2538:115b-15: // / de ltar de yan chad du rgyud rgyas pa las rigs bsdus pa dang /
T02D2538:115b-16: bye brag pa'i lnga tshan brgyad brgya sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis bstan nas /
T02D2538:115b-17: da ni rgyud bsdus pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2538:115b-18: mchog sbyin rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs bcad lnga gsungs te /
T02D2538:115b-19: de la mchog sbyin zhes pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub gsol ba ni mchog gi sbyin pa ste /
T02D2538:115b-20: de ltar byon pa la mi phyed pa ni rdo rje'o //
T02D2538:115b-21: de nyid kyis na mchog tu gyur pa ni don
T02D2538:115b-22: dam pa se khyod lags so zhes bos shing de
T02D2538:115b-24: yang dag mthar gyur ni yon tan yang dag pa'i
T02D2538:115b-25: mthar phyin pa ni rje btsun khyod lags zhes pa
T02D2538:115b-26: ste / de bzhin nyid du gyur pa'o //
T02D2538:115b-27: stong nyid las byung ni aa ste /
T02D2538:115b-29: yang na stong pa nyid kyi snying po bdag nyid can cig rje btsun khyod lags so zhe'o //
T02D2538:115b-30: de bzhin du sangs rgyas dang byang chub kyang khyod
T02D2538:115b-31: lags so zhes pa ste rdo rje rigs kyi mtshan
T02D2538:115b-32: bsdus pa'o // sangs rgyas chags pa zhes pa rje
T02D2538:115b-33: btsun khyod ni sangs rgyas chags pa can zhig lags
T02D2538:115b-34: bsdus pa'o // zhes bstod de // gang la chags she na /
T02D2538:115b-35: rang rig pa'i ye shes kyi chos nyid stong pa la chags la /
